K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:7b-12: padma dkar po sdong bu beed'urya las byas pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:7b-13: ze ba rdo rje las byas pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:7b-14: bung ba mang po skad 'byin pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:7b-15: dri bsung zhim po dang ldan pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:7b-20: lda ldi chen po sha stag khyer ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:7b-21: lda ldi chen po rnams kyi mdun du'ang byang chub sems dpa'i skyes pa'i rabs kyi spyod pa ri mor bris pa chen po dag thogs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:7b-22: ri mo'i gzugs re re'i glo g-yas g-yon nas kyang zlos gar gyi gar thabs yul dbus nas byung ba rnam pa sna tshogs byed de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:7b-23: gar thabs byed pa de'i nang na sil snyan rin po che las byas pa'i rdza rnga dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:7b-28: pi wang rgyud gcig pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:7b-30: dung la sogs pa dag brdung zhing 'bud do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:7b-31: gar thabs kyi sil snyan de dag las kyang kye ma 'jig rten stongs par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:8a-0: zhes bya ba de lta bu'i rnam pa brjod cing gdung @8a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:8a-1: gdung skad du dbyangs len to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:8a-2: gar thabs kyi sil snyan re re'i mdun du'ang me tog dri zhim po sna tshogs rnam par 'tsher ba rnams kyi phye mas rin po che'i skon bu legs par bcos pa gzhon sha can dag gis bkang ba sha stag dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:8a-3: de ma yin pa'i skon bu mang po blta na sdug pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:8a-4: gur gum gyi phye mas bkang ba sha stag thogs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:8a-5: de dag gi mdun du'ang bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun gyis 'khor dang bcas pa khyab par 'gyur ba'i zhal zas dag khyer zhing 'dong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:8a-6: zhal zas de dag kyang bud shing tsandan dmar po dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:8a-8: thang shing gi me chung dus btsos pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:8a-9: gang+g'a'i klung gi chus btsos pa sha stag ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:8a-15: kha ba'i ro dang ldan pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:8a-17: phan par 'gyur ba sha stag ga /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:8a-18: s'a la zung gi drung gi nyen kor thams cad kyang gser gyi bye ma 'jam pos brdal te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:8a-24: zab dar 'jam zhing mdog dkar ba rnams kyang bting ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:8a-25: grub pa'i gnas de'i gzhi dpag tshad sum cu rtsa gnyis khor khor yug kyang gur gum gyis byugs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:8a-27: dge slong gi dge 'dun bcas pa'i sengge'i khri chen po gser las byas pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:8b-0: rin po che snga [?] bdun @8b gyis spras shing snang bar byas pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:8b-1: ri rab ltar che zhing 'phang mtho ba dag kyang bshams so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:8b-2: g-yogs ma'ang de dag gi rkyen du 'tsham pa sha stag gis g-yogs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:8b-3: gser gyi dril bu g-yer ka sgra sil li li dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:8b-4: khrol shing gi sgra 'byung ba'i dra ba can gyi yol ba rnams kyis ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:8b-6: rgya dar spu sdug yug khyim chen po'i bla re rnams ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:8b-8: gdugs dkar po rnams kyis ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:8b-10: rnga yab dkar po rnams kyis ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:8b-12: rgyab rten glang po che'i mche ba la chu srin ma ka ra brten pa'i kha nas zla ba nya ba'i 'od zer ltar dkar ba'i mu tig gi chun po 'byung zhing dbyangs pa dang ldan pa rnams ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:8b-15: me tog dri zhim po'i sil mas gtor to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:8b-16: dge bsnyen de dag re re nas kyang 'di snyam du sems te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:8b-17: bdag gis sems can thams cad la zas 'dod pa rnams la ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:8b-21: mgo bo dang mig la sogs pa yan lag dang nyid lag thams cad 'dod pa rnams la'ang ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin du sbyin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:8b-24: phongs pa rnams la'ang 'dod pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:8b-27: ma brtags pa'i sbyin pa rnams ma gtogs par gang dang gang dag ci dang ci 'dod pa de dag chog par sbyar ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:8b-31: de bzhin du dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi sde tshan /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:9a-1: chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la gnas pa de dag thams cad kyis bsam pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:9a-2: de bzhin gshegs pa la bdag gis bshos gsol te yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:9a-3: de bzhin gshegs pa la bdag gis bshos gsol te yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:9a-5: so so nas de 'ba' zhig snying la sems shing yan lag thams cad kyi ba spu rgya skyegs kyi shing gi me tog ltar rtsa dmar ba ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:9a-8: mchi ma khrag lta bus gang ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:9a-9: mchog tu sdug bsngal ba'i tshor ba dang ldan nas rang rang gi mchod pa'i yo byad bud shing dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:9a-14: ba dan rnams dang chas te zhal zas kyi mchog gis sbyar ba'i snod rnams thogs nas bcom ldan 'das ga la der dong ste lhags nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag btsal te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:9a-22: bla re rgya chen po dag gis mchod nas lan 'bum bskor ba byas te mig nas mchi ma rgyun mi chad par char bzhin du phab nas bdag nyid la sdug bsngal gyi rnam pa mang po byed cing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:9a-23: kye ma 'jig rten stongs par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:9a-24: kye ma 'jig rten stongs par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:9b-0: zhes de skad du skad po che @9b 'don te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:9b-1: de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhabs drung na srog chags shi shu ma ra bzhin du 'gre ldog cing gsol ba 'debs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:9b-2: bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi 'khor dang bcas pas bdag gis sbyar ba'i bshos gsol bar ci gnang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:9b-4: bdag la thugs brtse ba'i slad du sbyin pa'i tha ma de bzhin gshegs pas bzhes su gsol zhes gsol ba 'debs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:9b-5: de nas bcom ldan 'das thams cad mkhyen bzhin du cang mi gsung bar gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:9b-6: de dag gis lan gnyis lan gsum du de skad ces gsol kyang lan gnyis lan gsum du bcom ldan 'das cang mi gsung bar gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:9b-7: de nas dge bsnyen gyi tshogs de dag re thag chad de cang mi zer bar 'khod nas bu gcig pa shi nas dur khrod du bor ma thag pa'i pha ma 'gre ldog pa bzhin du shin tu sdug bsngal bar gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:9b-8: de bzhin du dge bsnyen de dag thams cad mchog tu sdug bsngal bar gyur pa las langs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:9b-9: rang rang gi mchod pa'i yo byad rnams bsdus nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:9b-10: gzhan yang de'i tshe bslab pa'i gzhi lnga blangs shing tshul khrims dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:9b-12: yon tan dang ldan pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:10a-0: dam pa'i chos kyi gces pa 'dzin pa'i dge bsnyen ma tshong dpon gyi bu mo 'tsho ba'i dpal la sogs pa dge bsnyen ma gang+g'a'i klung gsum gyi bye ma snyed thams cad kyang bud med kyi gzugs kyis sems can bya ba phrag @10a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:10a-1: mang po nges par sgrol ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:10a-2: khyim gyi gnas la smod pa sha stag ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:10a-4: nyes pa'i khams brgyad cu rtsa bzhi las lhags pas bsdus pa'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:10a-5: lus 'di ni; srin bu'i rigs bye ba phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi'i zas so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:10a-7: rgyal po'i khri mon du brubs pa'i dri ma nam pa'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:10a-9: khyi ro rul pa'i dri bam gyis lhag par sbags pa'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:10a-11: sgo dgu nas mi gtsang ba 'dzags pa'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:10a-18: rkang lag gi phyi sgo dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:10a-23: yid rgyal po lta bu'i pho brang grong khyer lta bu'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:10a-25: mkhas pa thams cad kyis sbangs shing byis pa'i skye bo dga' bar byed pa'i 'dod chags dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:10a-27: gti mug la sogs pa'i nyon mongs pa bye ba snyed kyi srin po brten pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:10a-31: chu shing lta bur snying po med pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:10a-33: ri gzar po'i 'bab chu'i dba' rlabs ltar shin tu mi brtan pa'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:10a-37: zla ba'i gzugs brnyan ltar slu bar byed pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:10a-38: rlung shugs drag pos rnam par dkrugs pa'i chu'i shugs kyis brkos pa'i 'gram gyi sdong po ltar g-yang sa na 'dug pa'i chos can /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:10b-2: bya rog rnams kyi zas yin na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:10b-3: su zhig 'di lta bu 'chang ba la dga' bar byad /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:10b-4: rgya mtsho'i chu thams cad skra'i rtse mos blangs te ba lang gi mig rjes su blugs par ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:10b-5: nus srid kyi; lus nad bzhi brgya rtsa gzhis gzir ba 'di snying po med pa'am mi gtsang ba ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:10b-6: tshig tsam gyis bstan par mi nus so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:10b-7: sa chen po 'di rgya shug gi 'bras bu'i rus pa'i 'bru tsam sha stag tu byas pa'am /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:10b-9: rdul phra rab kyi rdul tsam sha stag tu byas pas ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:10b-11: lus 'di yod kyi bar du 'di'i nyes dmigs ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:10b-12: mthar thug par mi 'gyur te; de bas na dam pa'i chos bsrung ba'i phyir 'di mchil ma bzhin du dor bar bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:10b-14: 'di ltar dge bsnyen ma de dag thams cad chen po stong pa nyid dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:10b-16: smon pa med pa bsgoms pas sems bsgoms pa sha stag ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:10b-18: dge bsnyen ma 'tsho ba'i dpal zhes bya ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:10b-19: dge bsnyen ma dpal phreng zhes bya ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:10b-20: dge bsnyen ma sa ga zhes bya ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:10b-21: de la sogs pa thams cad kyang theg pa chen po thos par 'dod la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:10b-22: thos nas kyang gzhan dag la bstan par bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:10b-25: bud med kyi lus ngan no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:10b-28: snyam du smod pa so so nas shas cher sgom pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:10b-30: snyam du sems pa sha stag dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:11a-0: theg pa chen pos sko ma la ngoms nas kyang gzhan @11a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:11a-1: skom pa dag ngom par bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:11a-2: snyam du dam bcas pa sha stag dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:11a-3: theg pa chen po la sred pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:11a-4: theg pa chen po la ser sna med pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:11a-5: 'jig rten thams cad dang mthun par slob par 'dod pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:11a-6: grol nas gzhan dgrol bar bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:11a-7: rgal nas gzhan bsgral bar bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:11a-8: dkon mchog gsum gyi gdung mi 'chad par bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:11a-9: chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:11a-10: snyam du slob par 'dod pa sha stag dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:11a-11: go cha chen po bgos pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:11a-12: bslab pa rnams la brtul zhugs brtan pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:11a-13: de bzhin du yon tan du ma dang ldan pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:11a-14: bu gcig pa la bya ba bzhin du sems can thams cad la snying rje dang ldan pa sha stag ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:11a-15: de dag kyang nyi ma 'char kar shin tu rigs par gcig la gcig 'jus te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:11a-16: de bzhin gshegs pa'i gdung zhugs la bzhen pa'i phyir yam bsreg shing dge bsnyen pa rnams kyi nyis 'gyur khyer ba las bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal zas ma bzhes nas bu shi ba bzhin du mchog tu sdug bsngal bar gyur te; ngus nas langs te phyogs gcig tu 'khod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:11a-17: gzhan yang de'i tshe li tsa ba'i gzhon nu gtsang ma dri ma med pa'i snying po la sogs pa yangs pa can na gnas pa'i li tsa b'i gzhon nu grong khyer gyi nang na gnas pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:11a-18: phyi rol na gnas pa dang bcas pa rnams dang /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:11b-1: tshul khrims dang cho ga dang yon tan dang ldan pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:11b-2: dam pa'i chos sun 'byin cing rtags can 'chal pa rnams kyi ser ba lta bur gyur pa sha stag la de dag thams cad kyang 'di lta bur 'dod de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:11b-6: pang ba'i tshogs gang yin pa de dag thams cad ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:11b-7: bdud rtsi mi zad par bya ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:11b-8: bdud rtsi gnas par bya ba'i phyir yin gyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:11b-9: bdag cag gis dam pa'i chos la nan tan bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:11b-10: dam pa'i chos la sun 'byin cing log bar lta ba rnams kyi lce gcad par bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:11b-11: zhes legs par dam bcas pa; tshul khrims 'chal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:11b-12: tshul khrims la mi gnas pa rnams ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:11b-13: gos dkar po gyon du bcug ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:11b-14: khyim pa'i las byed du gzhug go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:11b-16: dam pa'i chos sdug pa la ni; bla ma bzhin du rim gro bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:11b-18: dge 'dun la phan pa dang bde bar gnas par bya ba'i yongs su rdzogs par byas kyang des chog go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:11b-20: theg pa chen po thos par 'dod la thos nas kyang gzhan dag la bstan par bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:11b-21: snyam du yi dam bcas pa la brtan pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:11b-22: de la sogs pa'i yon tan dpag tu med pa dang ldan pa sha stag ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:11b-23: 'di lta ste li tsa b'i gzhon nu gtsang ma dri ma med pa'i snying po zhes bya ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:11b-24: sgrib pa dag pa zhes bya ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:11b-25: gangg'a'i chu dri ma med pas byin pa zhes bya ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:12a-0: de la sogs pa li tsa b'i gzhon nu de dag kyang @12a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:12a-2: re res kyang gdung zhugs la bzhen pa'i bud shing thang shing gi mchog dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:12a-5: yam bsreg shing bye ba phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:12a-6: mchod pa snga ma'i nyis 'gyur rnams khyer nas mchod pa rnams bsgrags te bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du dong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:12a-7: li tsa b'i gzhon nu re re zhing yang glang po che brgyad khri bzhi stong dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:12a-8: rta brgyad khri bzhi stong dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:12a-9: shing rta brgyad khri bzhi stong dang chas so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:12a-10: nor bu chu shel brgyad khri bzhi stong dang chas so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:12a-11: glang po che re re'i mdun du'ang che ba la 'os pa'i gdugs dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:12a-14: dar gyi bla re chen po rnams thogs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:12a-15: gdugs rnams kyi nang na thung du gang yin pa de la'ang kho ra khor yug tu dpag tshad gcig yod do; ;dar gyi bla re chen po rnams kyi nang na chung du gang yin pa de la'ang chu zheng du dpag tshad sum cu rtsa gnyis yod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:12a-16: rgyal mtshan rnams kyi nang na thung du gang yin pa de la'ang 'phang du dpag tshad brgya yod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:12a-17: ba dan rnams kyi nang na thung du gang yin pa des kyang dpag tshad stong du phyin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:12a-18: de ltar de dag mchod pa rnams dang bcas te bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du dong nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag btsal te zhal zas phul ba las bcom ldan 'das cang mi gsung ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:12a-19: ma bzhes nas mchog tu sdug bsngal bar gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:12b-0: @12b re thag chad nas langs te bcom ldan 'das kyi mthus ta la bdun gyi srid tsam du 'phags te 'khod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:12b-1: gzhan yang de'i tshe dzambu gling pa'i blon po dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:12b-3: khyim bdag gangg'a lnga'i bye ma snyed thams cad kyang theg pa chen po la dad pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:12b-4: tshul khrims dang cho ga dang yon tan rnam par dag pa dang ldan pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:12b-5: dam pa'i chos sun 'byin pa rnams kyi ser ba lta bur gyur pa sha stag ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:12b-7: khyim bdag gi rgyal po rnam par snang byed ces bya ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:12b-8: 'gro ba skyong zhes bya ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:12b-9: chos skyong zhes bya ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:12b-10: de la sogs pa dag kyang de'i tshe der lhags te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:12b-11: de dag thams cad kyis kyang rang rang gi mchod pas mchod pa snga ma rnams zil gyis mnan nas bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa chen po'i tshogs kyis mchod nas zhal zas ma bzhes pa'i phyir mchog tu sdug bsngal bar gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:12b-12: re thag chad nas langs te bcom ldan 'das kyi mthus ta la bdun gyi srid tsam du 'phags te 'khod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:12b-13: gzhan yang de'i tshe rgyal po ma skyes dgra ma gtogs par yangs pa can gyi rgyal po zla ba dri ma med pa'i snying po grong khyer gyi nang na gnas pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:12b-14: phyi rol na gnas pa'i g-yog 'khor dang bcas pa la sogs pa dzambu gling thams cad kyi grong khyer dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:12b-17: kha lungs kyi rgyal po gangg'a'i klung drug gi bye ma snyed dang lhan cig tu dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi dang bcas te lhags so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:13a-0: rgyal po de rnams re re la'ang dmag 'khrugs ya @13a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:13a-1: phrag bco brgyad bco brgyad yod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:13a-2: de dag la glang po che rtag tu 'gram pa nas rdul 'dzag pa dag dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:13a-3: rta rlung gi shugs pas lhag par mgyogs pa dag kyang yod do; ;de dag gi mchod pa'i yo byad gang yin pa de dag kyang mchod pa'i yo byad snga ma de dag las nyis 'gyur gyis ches bzang la ches mang ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:13a-4: de lta bu'i mchod pa'i phul dag khyer nas dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi dang bcas te lhags so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:13a-5: de dag gi mchod pa da rnams kyi nang na gdugs thung ngu gang yin pa de'ang dpag tshad brgyad cu chu zheng gab par 'dug go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:13a-6: ba dan gyi nang na chung du gang yin pas kyang dpag tshad brgya stong du phyin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:13a-7: rgyal mtshan phal pa gang yin pa de la'ang 'phang du dpag tshad sum cu yod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:13a-8: de ltar yangs pa can gyi rgyal po zla ba dri ma med pa'i snying po dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:13a-10: de la sogs pa rgyal po rnams nyi ma 'char kar lhags te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:13a-11: de dag kyang dam pa'i chos sun 'byin cing rtags can 'chal pa rnams kyi ser ba lta bur gyur pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:13a-12: mthus kyang sems can rnams dam pa'i chos la 'god par byed pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:13a-16: bang pa'i tshogs gang yin pa de dag ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:13a-17: dam pa'i chos gnas par bya ba'i phyir ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:13a-18: snyam du sems pa sha stag dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:13a-19: bdag cag gis dam pa'i chos la nan tan bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:13b-0: dam pa'i chos sun 'byin pa rnams kyi lce ni drung nas @13b gcad do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:13b-1: zhes dam bcas pa brtan por byas pa sha stag dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:13b-2: theg pa chen po 'dod pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:13b-3: 'jig rten thams cad la snying brtse ba sha stag ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:13b-4: de dag gi mchod pa rnams kyis yangs pa can nas grong khyer ku shi'i bar thams cad kun tu gang bar gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:13b-5: de dag gi gdugs kyi grib ma 'dab chags su 'dug pas ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:13b-6: nyi ma'i 'od kyis mi phog go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:13b-7: de dag gi kha zas kyi dri bsung gis ni; dpag tshad bzhir khyab par gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:13b-8: de dag gis bcom ldan 'das la rang rang gis sbyar ba'i zhal sa bzhes par lan gsum gyi bar du gsol pa btab kyang zhal zas ma bzhes nas yid mi dga' ste langs nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:13b-9: gzhan yang de'i tshe rgyal po ma skyes dgra'i btsun ma me gtogs par yangs pa can gyi rgyal po'i btsun mo 'jig rten gsum na mdzes ma la sogs pa dzambu gling pa'i rgyal po dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:13b-11: khyim bdag rnams kyi chung ma gangg'a'i klung bdun gyi bye ma snyed dang lhan cig tu lhags te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:13b-12: de dag thams cad kyang bud med kyi gzugs kyis sems can mang po nges par sgrol pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:13b-13: rtag tu lus [?] dam pa dang ldan pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:13b-14: chen po stong pa nyid dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:13b-16: smon pa med pas sems rnam par dag pa sha stag ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:13b-17: 'di lta ste; yangs pa can gyi rgyal po'i btsun mo 'jig rten gsum na mdzes ma zhes bya ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:13b-18: btsun mo bri yang gu zhes bya ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:14a-0: de la sogs pa thams cad kyang sems can thams cad la bu @14a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:14a-1: gcig pa la bya ba bzhin du snying rje dang ldan pa sha stag ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:14a-2: gcig la gcig 'jus nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i gdung zhugs la bzhen pa'i phyir yam bsreg shing rnams khyer te mchod pa snga ma thams cad rang rang gi mchod pa rnams kyis zil gyis mnan nas bcom ldan 'das la nyis 'gyur du mchod pa byas te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:14a-3: de dag gi mchod pa'i yo byad rnams kyi rgyal mtshan dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:14a-5: gdugs rnams kyi 'phang dang chu zheng gi tshad kyang snga ma'i nyis 'gyur bas lhag go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:14a-6: kha zas rnams kyi dri bsung ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:14a-7: dpag tshad brgyad du khyab par gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:14a-8: bcom ldan 'das la phyag btsal nas zhal zas bzhes par gsol ba btab kyang zhal zas ma bzhes nas bcom ldan 'das la bskor ba byed cing skra 'bal la rang rang gi rgyan rnams 'thor zhing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:14a-9: skad mi snyan pas du ste bu gcig pa shi ba bzhin du mchog tu sdug bsngal bar gyur nas bcom ldan 'das kyi mthus s'a la zung gi drung nyid du phyogs gcig tu 'khod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:14a-10: gzhan yang de'i tshe lha mig yangs zhes bya ba la sogs pa lha'i tshogs gangg'a'i klung brgyad kyi bye ma snyed dang lhan cig tu lhags nas lha de dag gis 'di skad ces smras so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:14a-15: mi rnams kyi mchod pa'i yo byad mchog tu khyad par du 'phags la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:14b-0: de bzhin gshegs dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i @14b sangs rgyas la mchod pa bkur sti thams cad kyis mchod par 'dod de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:14b-1: mi rnams kyi zhal zas kyi tha ma bzhes pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das la gsol ba 'debs kyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:14b-3: bdag cag gis kyang de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la so so nas mchod pa bya zhing tha ma'i dus su zhal zas dbul bar bya na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:14b-4: ji ltar bdag cag gis phul pa'i zhal zas de bzhin gshegs pas gsol te yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar de bzhin gshegs pas mdzod cig gu /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:14b-8: de bas kyang zhal zas kyi tha ma'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa phun sum tshogs pa ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:14b-10: kye ma bcom ldan 'das yongs su mya ngan las 'das na ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:14b-13: lha de dag thams cad kyang theg pa chen po thos par 'dod la thos nas kyang gzhan dag la bstan to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:14b-15: theg pa chen pos skom la ngoms nas kyang gzhan skom pa rnams ngom par bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:14b-17: theg pa chen po la sred pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:14b-18: theg pa chen po la ser sna med pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:14b-19: theg pa chen po la phrag dog dang dus che ba dang 'chab pa dang sgyu med pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:14b-20: theg pa chen po sun 'byin pa'i sems can rnams kyi ser ba lta bur gyur pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:14b-21: dam pa'i chos srung pa'i tshul khrims blangs pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:14b-22: 'jig rten dang mthun par slob par 'dod pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:15a-0: @15a *// bdag cag rgal nas gzhan bsgral bar bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:15a-1: bdag cag gol nas gzhan dgrol bar bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:15a-2: chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:15a-3: dkon mchog gsum gyi gdung mi 'chad par bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:15a-5: go cha chen po bgos pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:15a-6: bslab pa rnams la dam bcas pa brtan pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:15a-7: de bzhin du yon tan dpag tu med pa dang ldan pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:15a-8: bu gcig pa la bya ba bzhin du 'jig rten thams cad la snying rjes lta ba sha stag ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:15a-9: de dag kyang nyi ma 'char kar ston pa yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba'i gdung zhugs la bzhen pa'i phyir bud shing dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:15a-10: yam bsreg shing rnams khyer te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:15a-11: de dag kyang snga mas phul ba'i yam bsreg shing gi nyis 'gyur bas bzang pa'i lha rdzas dri bsung dang ldan pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:15a-13: mi la dkon pa sha stag go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:15a-14: shing rta'ang rta'i mchog mgyogs pa dag dang sbyar pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:15a-15: dar la dkar pos g-yogs pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:15a-16: gzugs dang dbyibs ri mo brir yang mi nus pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:15a-17: dril bu g-yer ka'i dra ba can gyi yol bas bskor ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:15a-18: dar yug khyim chen po'i bla re rgya chen po rtsa ba ri mo can dag la btsugs pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:15a-19: gar thabs dang rol mo yid du 'ong ba rnams kyis mdun du drangs pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:15a-20: kha zas zhim po mang po dag dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:15a-21: sengge'i khri beed'urya'i rgyab rten rtse mo nor bu'i 'od kyis snang bar byas pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:15a-22: zhabs rten gser las byas pa dag kyang bshams pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:15b-0: sa phyogs kyang me tog @15b dri bsung zhim po sna tshogs kyis mdzes par byas pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:15b-1: me tog gi sil ma bkram zhing bkod pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:15b-2: dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi phyi bzhin 'brang ba sha stag ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:15b-3: so so nas mchi ma khrag lta bu mi thub cing mchog tu sdug bsngal bas gdungs nas sems can thams cad la phan pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:15b-6: gdul bar bya ba'i dbang gi don du theg pa chen po'i mchog tu gsang ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:15b-7: stong pa nyid kyi rnam pa dgongs pa'i tshig rnam pa sna tshogs kyi chos kyi sgo'i chul bshad par bya ba'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du dong ste bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag btsal nas mchod pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:15b-8: bkur sti'i mchog rnam po mang po dag byas te bskor ba'ang byas nas bcom ldan 'das kyi 'khor rnams kyi phyir rang rang gi bla gos sa la bting ste rang rang gi rgyan rnams phog cing gtor nas rang rang gi skra 'bal cing skad mi snyan pas du ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:15b-9: bcom ldan 'das la tshig mthun par 'di skad ces gsol to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:15b-10: bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag gis sbyar ba'i bshos gsol te yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar mdzad du gsol zhes lan gnyis lan gsum du gsol ba btab kyang bcom ldan 'das kyis ma bzhes te cang mi gsung nas de dag re thag chad de langs nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:15b-11: gzhan yang de'i tshe klu'i rgyal po phyogs bzhi na gnas pa klu'i rgyal po nor rgyas kyi bu dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:16a-0: nye dga' bol sogs pa klu'i @16a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:16a-2: klung dgu'i bye ma snyed shin tu rings par nyi ma 'char kar lha rnams kyi mchod pa las kyang nyis 'gyur bas lhag pa'i mchod pa'i yo byad rang rang gi 'byor pa dang 'tsham pa dag khyer nas bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du dong ste phyag btsal nas zhal zas bzhes par gsol ba btab kyang bsam pa bzhin du ma grub nas langs te phyogs gcig tu 'khod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:16a-3: gzhan yang de'i tshe rnam thos kyi bu la sogs pa gnod sbyin gyi bdag po g-yog 'khor dang bcas pa gangg'a'i klung bcu'i bye ma snyed gcig la gcig 'jus nas rang rang gi mchod pa rnams kyis klu'i rgyal po rnams kyi mchod pa snga ma zil gyis mnan nas tshogs chen po dang chas te lhags nas bcom ldan 'das la phyag btsal te zhal zas bzhes par gsol ba btab kyang bcom ldan 'das kyis zhal zas ma bzhes nas yid mi dga' ste langs nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:16a-4: gzhan yang de'i tshe nam mkha' lding gi bdag po dgra'i mdza' bo zhes bya ba la sogs pa nam mkha' lding gi rgyal po gangg'a'i klung nyi shu'i bye ma snyed kyis rang rang gi mchod pas gnod sbyin gyi rgyal po snga ma dag gi mchod pa rnams zil gyis mnan nas bcom ldan 'das la phyag btsal te zhal zas bzhes par gsol ba btab kyang zhal zas ma bzhes nas yid mi dga' ste langs nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:16b-0: gzhan yang de'i tshe dri za'i bdag po mis byin @16b gyi bu la sogs pa dri za'i bdag po gangg'a'i klung sum cu'i bye ma snyed kyis mchod pa snga ma thams cad pas kyang ches mchog tu gyur pa'i mchod pa rnams khyer te 'ongs nas de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa byas te rol mo snyan rgu byas nas phyag btsal te bcom ldan 'das la zhal zas bzhes par gsol ba btab kyang bcom ldan 'das kyis ma bzhes nas de dag kyang yid mi dga' bar gyur te langs nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:16b-1: gzhan yang de'i tshe mi'am ci'i bdag po legs mthong la sogs pa mi'am ci'i bdag po gangg'a'i klung bzhi bcu'i bye ma snyed lhags te snga ma rnams kyi mchod pa de dag bsdoms pa bas kyang de dag re re'i mchod pa ches khyad par 'phags par gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:16b-2: de dag kyang zhal zas ma bzhes nas yid mi dga' bar gyur te phyogs gcig tu 'khod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:16b-3: gzhan yang de'i tshe lto 'phye chen po'i bdag po legs mthong chen po la sogs pa lto 'phye chen po'i bdag po gangg'a'i klung lnga bcu'i bye ma snyed kyis mchod pa snga ma'i nyis 'gyur khyer ba las sdam bzhin du zhal zas ma bzhes nas yid mi dga' ste phyogs gcig tu 'khod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:16b-4: gzhan yang de'i tshe lha ma yin gyi bdag po bde mchog rigs la sogs pa lha ma yin gyi bdag po gangg'a'i klung drug cu'i bye ma snyed lus che zhing snang ba chen po dang ldan pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:16b-5: lha ma yin gyi bsam pa med pa sha stag gis mchod pa snga ma'i nyis 'gyur nyis 'gyur gyi mchod pa dag khyer te 'ongs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:17a-0: bcom ldan 'das la phyag btsal nas zhal zas @17a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:17a-1: ma bzhes te yid mi dga' bar gyur nas langs te shing s'a la zung gi drung du rang rang gi gzi byin gyis snang bar byas te 'khod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:17a-2: gzhan yang de'i tshe sbyin byed ma'i bu'i bdag po gangg'a'i chu dri ma med pa rjes byin la sogs pa sbyin byed ma'i bu gangg'a'i klung bdun cu'i bye ma snyed lus che zhing snang ba chen po dang ldan pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:17a-3: sbyin byed ma'i bu'i bsam pa med pa sha stag gis mchod pa snga ma thams cad las mchod pa nyis 'gyur nyis 'gyur bas bzang ba dag khyer ba las snga ma bzhin du zhal zas ma bzhes nas yid mi dga' bar gyur te shing s'a la zung gi drung du rang rang gi gzi brjid kyis snang bar byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:17a-4: gzhan yang de'i tshe srin po'i bdag po 'jigs byed la sogs pa srin po'i dbang po gangg'a'i klung brgyad cu'i bye ma snyed srin po'i bsam pa med pa sha stag gis gzi brjid chen po'i tshogs kyis s'a la zung gi drung du snang bar byas nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:17a-5: bcom ldan 'das la phyag btsal te phyogs gcig tu 'khod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:17a-6: gzhan yang de'i tshe 'bras bu'i shing gi bdag po dri sil la sogs pa 'bras bu'i shing gi bdag lo gdg'a'i klung dgu bcu'i bye ma snyed kyis snga ma'i mchod pa thams cad bas nyis 'gyur nyis 'gyur gyis lhag pa'i mchod pa'i tshogs khyer nas khu byug po rgyags pa rnams dang bung pa rnams skad 'byin pa dang ldan pa'i me tog 'tsher ba'i 'khri shing mang po'i dog pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:17b-0: lo ma kha 'bus @17b pa rnams kyis sa phyogs brgyan te phyogs gcig tu 'khod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:17b-1: gzhan yang de'i tshe rig sngags 'chang gi rgyal po sgyu 'phrul chen po la sogs pa rig sngags 'chang gi rgyal po gang+g'a'i klung stong gi bye ma snyed kyis mchod pa snga ma'i nyis 'gyur bas lhag pa'i mchod pa dag khyer nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:17b-2: gzhan yang de'i tshe lha mo 'dod rgyur sgyur ba'i gzugs can lags mthong ma la sogs pa gangg'a'i klung bye ba'i bye ma snyed kyis yangs pa can gyi rgyal po'i btsun mo'i mchod pa nyis 'gyur bas lhag pa dag khyer te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:17b-3: rang rang gi rgyan rnams bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar sa la spungs nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:17b-4: gzhan yang de'i tshe lha'i bu mo rambha dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:17b-5: aurba shi la sogs pa lha'i bu mo gangg'a'i klung bye ba phrag brgya'i bye ma snyed mchod pa snga ma'i nyis 'gyur nyis 'gyur bas ches lhag par mang zhing spa ba dag gis mdun du drangs te snga ma bzhin du phyogs gcig tu 'khod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:17b-6: gzhan yang de'i tshe 'byung po'i tshogs pa ba sangs ltar 'khor ba zhes bya ba la sogs pa gadg'a'i klung bye ba phrag snyong gi bye ma snyed snga ma bzhin du phyogs gcig tu 'khod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:18a-0: gzhan yang de'i tshe 'jig rten skyong ba bzhi'i lha'i bu gadg'a'i klung bye ba phrag 'bum dang lhan cig tu mchod pa snga ma'i nyis 'gyur nyis 'gyur bas lhag pa dag khyer nas bcom ldan 'das la phyag btsal te zhal zas bzhes par gsol ba btab kyang bcom ldan 'das kyis ma bzhes nas snga ma @18a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:18a-1: bzhin du phyogs gcig tu 'khod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:18a-2: gzhan yang de'i tshe rlung lha bzhi rlung gtong ba'i lha gangg'a'i klung bye ba phrag 'bum dang lhan cig tu dus ma yin par yang shing ljon pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:18a-8: byu ru rnams kyis sa phyogs brgyan par byed cing dus tshigs thams cad kyi me tog gi dpal rnams phyogs su rgyas par byed la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:18a-9: lo ma kha 'bus pa rtsa ba dmar pa rnams kyis shing s'a la zung nyi ma 'char ka'i 'od zer ser po ja hong khar 'dug pa bzhin du byas nas mchod pa snga ma'i nyis 'gyur bas lhag pa'i mchod pa dag khyer te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:18a-10: bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byas nas snga ma bzhin du shing s'a la zung gi drung du 'khod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:18a-11: gzhan yang de'i tshe char pa 'bebs pa'i lha gangdg'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed sprin chen po dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:18a-12: chu skyar rnams phyi bzhin 'brang zhing glog 'gyu ba'i gseb nas rma bya'i mgrin pa ltar mdog sde ba'i char gyi rgyun 'bab la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:18a-13: 'brug sgra dal nas sgrog pa'i sprin dang ldan pas char zim bu bsil ba dang 'dres pa'i me tog gi char 'bebs shing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:18a-14: bcom ldan 'das la phyag btsal te zhal zas ma bzhes nas re thag chad de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:18a-15: de bzhin gshegs pa'i gdung zhugs la bzhen pa'i me gsad pa'i phyir nam mkha' nyid la 'khod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:18a-16: gzhan yang de'i tshe spos kyi glang po sgra gcan dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:18b-1: 'dod rgu'i spos ldan la sogs pa spos kyi glang po gang+g'a'i klung nyi shu'i bye ma snyed theg pa chen po 'dod pa sha stag gis ston pa yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba'i phyir gangs kyi sman dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:18b-3: sdong bu shing rta chen po'i 'phang lo tsam sha stag dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:18b-4: dgon pa chen po dag nas padma dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:18b-10: rdo gu sna tha dad pa du ma dag sna'i thor tos byung zhing phung zhing khyer te rlung gi shugs pas kyang ches mgyogs pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:18b-11: shin tu rings par dbyar gyi 'brug sgra bzhin du sgrog cing lhags nas padma'i 'dab ma bcer ba'i sengge'i khri lda ldi dag bshams te bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byas nas zhal zas ma bzhes nas re thag chad de phyogs gcig tu 'khod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:18b-12: gzhan yang de'i tshe sedge sedge'i sgra sgrog pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa sedge gadg'a'i gklung sum cu'i bye ma snyed sems can thams cad la mi 'jigs pa sbyin pa sha stag gis sedge'i rtsal chen pos spos kyi glang po che rnams dang 'dra bar me tog dang 'bras bu rnams khyer te rings par lhags nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:18b-13: gzhan yang de'i che bya ngang pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:18b-22: shang shang te'u la sogs pas kyang spos kyi glang po che rnams dang 'dra bar me tog dang 'bras bu khyer te rang rang gi skad phung nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:19a-0: @19a *// gzhan yang de'i tshe sa'i steng na ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:19a-2: ra ma mo yod do cog gis kyang nu ma'o mas bkang ste shin tu rings par lhags nas shing s'a la zung gi drung nas phyogs gshong zhig mthong nas der rang rang gi nu ma'o mas gang ba de dag las 'o ma gseg ma dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:19a-4: ba tshvas ma 'bags shing tsha ba'i skyon du 'gyur ba med pa dag gzigs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:19a-5: 'o ma de dag gi nang nas sbrang bu dag bsal nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:19a-6: gzhan yang de'i tshe drang srong bzod par smra ba la sogs pa gling bzhi na gnas pa'i drang srong mngon par shes pa lnga dang ldan pa theg pa chen po 'dod pa sha stag la gang+g'a'i klung dkrigs kyi bye ma snyed rang rang gi rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs kyis yam bsreg shing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:19a-7: zhal zas dag khyer nas bcom ldan 'das la phyag btsal te phyogs gcig tu 'khod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:19a-8: gzhan yang de'i tshe 'od srung chen po la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun kha cig dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:19a-9: gnas brtan kun dga' bo la sogs pa ma gtogs par yul phyogs na gnas pa'i dge slong dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:19a-10: dge slong ma ji snyed yod pa de dag thams cad kyang ma lus par der lhags so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:19a-11: ghan yang de'i tshe ri rab la sogs pa ri chen po rnams dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:19a-12: 'jig rten gyi bar mtshams kyi ri gangg'a'i klung grangs med pa'i bye ma snyed kyang shing ljon pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:19a-13: 'khri shing mang po nyin mtshan gyi grib ma byed pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:19b-0: brag zang @19b yags grib ma che ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:19b-1: brag kha nas 'bab pa'i chus gang ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:19b-4: 'bras bus gang ba dag kyang der lhags so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:19b-5: lha'i bu mthu bo che'i 'dun ma chen po dag kyang ri rab dang bcas te mchod pa'i phyir lhags nas bcom ldan 'das la phyag btsal te phyogs gcig tu 'khod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:19b-6: gzhan yang de'i tshe lha'i bu mthu bo che 'od chen po rgya mtsho chen po bzhi'i nang na gnas pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:19b-7: chu klung chen po dag gi nang na gnas pa gang+g'a'i klung grangs med pa'i bye ma snyed mchod pa lnga ma bas nyis 'gyur gyis mdzes pa'i mchod pa sngon du btang nas nyi ma'i 'od kyis mar me'i 'od zil gyis mnan pa bzhin du rang rang gi 'od kyis nyi ma'i 'od zil gyis mnan te nyi ma 'char ka'i 'od kyis shing mya ngan 'tshang gi lo ma thams cad dmar lam mer snang bar byed pa de bzhin du rang rang gi 'od kyis chu klung gser ldan gyi chu dmar lam mer snang bar byas nas bcom ldan 'das la phyag btsal te phyogs gcig tu 'khod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:19b-8: gzhan yang de'i tshe grong khyer ku shi nas shing s'a la zung gi drung gi bar skabs kyi bar snang la khang bzang ri'i dbang po'i rtse mo lta bu dang pa'i thal gong ltar dkar la sha stag gis 'khrigs par gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:19b-11: rdzing bu'i chu padmas mdzes par byas pa dag gis gang bar 'dug ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:19b-12: byang gi sgra mi snyan gyi skyed mos tshal bas kyang lhag par mdzes so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:19b-13: gcig tu na dga' ba'i tshal dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:20a-2: sa phyogs de dag de ltar dga' dga' ltar 'dug kyang lha dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:20a-4: mi de dag de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba'i phyir shin tu du'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:20a-5: gzhan yang de'i tshe rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams rang rang gi 'khor la 'di skad ces zer te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:20a-10: mi rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod pa'i las khyad par du 'phags la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:20a-11: de bzhin gshegs pa la zhal zas kyi tha ma 'bul ba la brtson gyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:20a-13: bdag cag kyang de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la so so nas mchod pa bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:20a-14: zhal zas kyi tha ma'ang dbul bar bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:20a-15: gal te bdag cag gis phul ba'i zhal zas kyi tha ma bcom ldan 'das kyis bzhes par gyur na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:20a-16: de las bdag cag gis sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa chen po thob par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:20a-17: zhes de dag gis de skad ces smras nas g-yog 'khor mang po grangs med pa dang bcas pas mchod pa snga ma'i nyis 'gyur gyi mchod pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:20a-18: zhal zas mang po dag khyer ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:20a-19: me tog mang po dag kyang khyer te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:20a-22: mand'a ra ba chen po rnams dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:20a-23: ke ke ru ka rnams dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:20a-24: ke ke ru ka chen po rnams dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:20a-26: manydzu sha ka chen po rnams dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:20b-1: santa ka chen po rnams dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:20b-7: mdzes sdug chen po rnams dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:20b-9: dga' byed chen po rnams dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:20b-11: dri mchog chen po rnams dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:20b-12: sngos gyi ngad ldang rnams dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:20b-13: spos kyi ngad ldang chen po rnams dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:20b-14: kun tu ngad ldang rnams dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:20b-15: kun tu ngad ldang chen po rnams dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:20b-16: mtha' yas ngad ldang rnams dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:20b-17: mtha' yas ngad ldang chen po rnams dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:20b-18: lha rdzas kyi 'dab ma rnams dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:20b-19: klung gi me tog rnams dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:20b-21: de lta bu gzhan dag kyang khyer nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste nyi ma'i gzi byin gyis srin bu me khyer gyi 'od zil gyis mnan pa bzhin du rang rang gi gzi byin gyis thams cad kyi 'od zil gyis mnan te zhal zas ma bzhes nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:20b-22: gzhan yang de'i tshe lha'i dbang po brgya byin sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi 'khor dang bcas pas mchod pa snga ma de'i nyis 'gyur /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:20b-24: de na yod pa'i me tog gi sna grangs du ma yid du 'ong ba rnams dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:20b-25: yid du 'ong ba chen po rnams dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:20b-26: dri bsung chen po rnams khyer ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:20b-27: khang bzang chen po rdo thal gyi mdog ltar dkar ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:20b-28: tham skas kyi rim pa dang ldan pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:21a-0: skar khung gi phreng ba du ma phug ron shug rtse ba dang ldan pa dag kyang sprul nas @21a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:21a-1: bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag btsal nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:21a-4: theg pa chen po'i mdo'i sde tshan srung pa lags na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:21a-5: bdag cag la thugs brtse ba'i slad du bdag cag gis phul ba'i zhal zas bzhes su gsol /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:21a-6: de skad ces gsol kyang zhal zas ma bzhes nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:21a-7: 'phags pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa theg pa chen po'i mdo /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:21a-9: de'i rjes la mthar gyis 'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha'i ris drug po rnams kyis steng gi bar snang la mchod pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:21a-10: 'od snga ma las khyad par du spags nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:21a-11: de dag gi mchod pa'i nang na gdugs phal pa gang yin pa'ang kho ra khor yug tu gling bzhi pa'i khyon tsam mo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:21a-12: ba dan phal pa gang yin pa de'ang rgya mtsho chen po bzhi'i mthar thug ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:21a-13: shar phyogs kyi rgya mtsho nas nub phyogs kyi rgya mtshor thug ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:21a-16: ba dan de dag las pi wang gi sgra snyan pa khong nas 'khyil ba lta bur snyan pa dag 'byung ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:21b-0: de dag bcom ldan 'das la phyag btsal nas zhal zas bzhes par gsol ba btab kyang bcom ldan 'das cang mi gsung nas re thag chad de phyogs @21b gcig tu 'khod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:21b-1: de'i tshe srid pa'i rtse mor skyes pa rnams ma gtogs par gong ma gong ma'i sems can gzhan gang yin pa de dag thams cad bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir mchod pa rgya chen po'i tshogs dang chas te lhags nas snga ma bzhin du phyogs gcig tu 'khod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:21b-2: mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa'ang tshangs ris kyi lha'i bu dpag tu med pa dag gis bskor zhing mdun du bdar te rang gi gzi byin gyis lha thams cad kyi gzi byin zil gyis mnan nas mchod pa'i tshogs chen po dang chas te bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du dong ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:21b-3: de dag gi ba dan phal pa gang yin pa de'ang tshangs pa'i 'jig rten nas 'phyang ste shing s'a la zung gi drung du thug go //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:21b-4: des kyang bcom ldan 'das la zhal zas bzhes par gsol ba las bcom ldan 'das kyis ma bzhes nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:21b-5: de nas de'i tshe lha ma yin gyi dbang po thags bzang ris lha ma yin gyi g-yog 'khor dpag tu med pa dang bcas pas tshangs pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:21b-6: dbang po gnyis ma gtogs par de'i bar gyi lha yod do cog gi 'od rang gi 'od kyis mog mog por byas nas de'i rkyen du 'tsham pa'i mchod pa'i tshogs la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:21b-7: rkyen du 'tsham pa'i zhal zas dag dang chas te bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du song ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:21b-8: de'i gdugs phal pa'ang chu zheng du 'jig rten gyi khams chung ngu khyab pa tsam ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:22a-0: des kyang bcom ldan 'das la zhal zas bzhes par gsol ba las bcom ldan 'das kyis ma bzhes @22a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:22a-1: nas langs te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:22a-2: de nas bdud sdig can chung ma grangs med pa'i 'khor dang chas te sems can dmyal ba thams cad kyi bar srang thams cad phye nas de dag la chu dang kha zas la sogs pa ci 'dod pa byin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:22a-3: de dag la de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dran par gyis shig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:22a-4: sbyin pa'i tha ma la rjes su yi rang bar gyis shig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:22a-5: ces smras nas de dag la khyed bde bar gyur cig ces kyang dbugs phyung ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:22a-6: sems can dmyal ba'i grong khyer mtshon chas gang zhing me chen po 'bar ba rnams su'ang sprin chen po bzhin du chu chen po phab nas sems can dmyal ba pa rnams kyis sngon ma myong ba'i bde ba dang ldan pa'i 'du shes bskyed de de bzhin gshegs pa'i mthus bdud kyi sems kyi gnas skabs de lta bur gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:22a-7: de'i 'khor gang yin pa de dag gis kyang gzhu dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:22a-11: rdo rje rtse gcig pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:22a-15: sha ta ka ni ha dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:22a-18: mdung rtse gcig pa la sogs pa mtshon cha rnam pa du ma yongs su spangs te chos lhur len par gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:22a-19: de'i mchod pa'ang lha snga ma rnams la med pa de lta bur gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:22a-20: de'i gdugs phal pa'i chu zheng du'ang 'jig rten gyi khams bar ma'i khyon tsam mo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:22b-0: de ltar de mthu chen po dang ldan @22b zheng rang gi chung ma rnams kyis rnga yab kyis g-yob bzhin du bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag btsal te thal mo sbyar nas 'di skad ces gsol to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:22b-1: bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun dang bcas pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:22b-2: 'khor dang bcas pas bdag cag gis phul ba'i zhal zas bzhes su gsol //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:22b-4: bdag cag gis de slan chad theg pa chen po'i slad du yi dam bca' bar 'tshal te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:22b-5: rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang su'ang rung 'jigs pa'i slad du'am /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:22b-6: rnyed pa dang bkur sti 'tshal ba'i slad du'am /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:22b-7: thob tu re ba'i slad du'am /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:22b-8: gzhan gyis bgyid du stsal pa'am /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:22b-9: gzhan gyi yid bsrung ba'i slad du'ang rung ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:22b-10: theg pa chen po rjod par bgyid na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:22b-12: mi dga' ba thams cad bsal ba'i gsang sngags bshad par 'tshal lo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:22b-18: a'a la m'a la t'a la sv'a h'a /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:22b-20: 'jigs pas gnod par gyur pa rnams chos kyi tshul la spobs pa bskyed par bgyi ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:22b-21: mu stegs pa rnams myos par bgyi ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:22b-22: dam pa'i chos bsrung ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:22b-23: bdag dang gzhan bsrung ba'i slad du bdag gis rang gi dam tshig gis mras [?] pa'i gsang sngags 'di glang po che'i 'jigs pa'am /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:23a-0: me'i 'jigs pa rnams kyi nang du srung @23a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:23a-1: sngags kyi don du brjod pa gang lags pa de dag ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:23a-2: brjod pa tsam gyis ji ltar rus sbal rang gi lus srung ba de bzhin du bdag gis g-yo dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:23a-3: sgyu ma mchis par de dag 'jigs pa thams cad las bsrung bar bgyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:23a-4: stobs dang ldan par yang bgyid lags na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:23a-5: bcom ldan 'das kyis da zhal zas 'di bzhes par gsol zhes bskul to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:23a-6: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bdud sdig can la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:23a-8: khyod kha zas kyi phyir gsol ba ma 'debs shig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:23a-9: gsang sngags kyi tshig 'dis sems can thams cad la phan pa'i phyir chos kyi sbyin par 'gyur bas na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:23a-11: zang zing gi sbyin pa ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:23a-15: ces bka' stsal nas bcom ldan 'das cang mi gsung bar gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:23a-16: lan gnyis lan gsum gyi bar du'ang bdud dang bdud kyi bu mo rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol ba btab pa las ma bzhes te re thag chad nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:23a-17: de nas de'i tshe lha'i bu dbang phyug chen po lha'i bu dpag tu med pa mthu dpag tu med pa dag gis mdun du bdar te rang gi 'od kyis tshangs pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:23a-20: bdud kyi 'od rnams snag tsha'i gong bu bzhin du 'od mi gsal bar byas te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:23b-0: bcom ldan 'das kyi mchod pa rgya chen po nyis 'gyur gnyis 'gyur bas lhag pa @23b dag khyer nas der song ste de'i mchod pa rnams kyi nang na gdugs phal pa gang yin pa de'ang chu zheng du stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams khyab par 'dug ste mchod pa de lta bu sngon du btang nas bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du phyin te lan du ma bskor ba byas nas zhabs la mgo bos phyag btsal te bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:23b-1: bcom ldan 'das la bdag mchod pa bgyid pa ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:23b-2: sbrang bu mchod pa bgyid pa dang 'dra ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:23b-3: bdag sbrang bu dang 'dra bas bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa bgyid pa'i rngo ga la thogs kyis kyang bcom ldan 'das bdag la thugs brtse ba'i slad du zhal zas kyi tha ma gsol bar ci gnang zhes lan gnyis lan gsum du gsol ba btab kyang lan gnyis lan gsum du bcom ldan 'das cang mi gsung bar gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:23b-4: re thag chad nas langs te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:23b-5: de nas de'i tshe sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas shar phyogs logs su 'jig rten gyi khams gang+g'a'i klung grangs med pa gtams khrag khrig gi bye ma snyed 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams yid 'phrog sgra snyan mu tug ces bya ba zhig yod de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:23b-6: de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nam mkha' dang mnyam pa zhes bya ba bzhugs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:23b-7: des sras kyi thu bo nyan thos lus chen mtha' yas la bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:24a-1: kyi 'jig rten gyi khams su song la de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sh'akya thub pa zhes bya ba ring po mi thogs par yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur gyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:24a-3: khyod kyis de'i don du 'jig rten gyi khams 'di nas zhal zas zhim po phan pa dag khyer te song zhig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:24a-4: mchod pa chen po dag kyang khyer te song la de la 'di skad du /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:24a-5: de bzhin gshegs pa bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal zas 'di gsol te yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar mdzad du gsol zhes gyis shig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:24a-7: yid gnyis ci dang ci yod pa de dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:24a-8: de dag kyang de bzhin gshegs pa de kho na la legs par zhus shig dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:24a-9: des khyod la lung ston par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:24a-11: de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lus chen mtha' yas des legs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:24a-13: zhes gsol nas de bzhin gshegs pa de la bskor ba byas nas zhabs la mgo bos phyag btsal te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:24a-14: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lus chen po grangs med pas bskor cing mdun du bdar nas mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir 'ongs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:24a-15: de nas de'i tshe stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di g-yos /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:24b-6: de la sogs pa byas te sa chen po rab tu g-yos so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:24b-7: de nas 'khor de dag gi nang na tshangs pa dang; dbang po dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:24b-10: dbang phyug chen po la sogs pa lha rnams kyis sa gzhi de lta bur gyur pa mthong nas skyi bung zhes byas te 'jigs shing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:24b-11: kha dang lkog ma bskams nas 'bros par chas te rang rang gi 'od kyang mi mthong zhing 'od nyams par gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:24b-12: de nas 'khor de nyid kyi nang nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa langs te lha'i tshogs de dag la 'di skad ces smras so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:24b-16: shar phyogs logs su 'jig rten gyi khams gang+g'a'i klung grangs med pa gtams phrag dkrigs kyi bye ma'i rdul phra rab grangs med pa snyed 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams yid 'brog sgra snyan mu tug ces bya ba zhig yod de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:24b-17: de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nam mkha' dang mnyam pa zhes bya ba da ltar bzhugs la 'tsho zhing gzhes te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:24b-18: de bzhin gshegs pa des rang gi sras kyi thu bo nyan thos la bos te bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:24b-20: khyod mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams su song la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:25a-0: de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sh'akya thub pa zhes bya ba yongs su mya ngan las @25a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:25a-2: de dge slong gi dge 'dun dang bcas pa la zhal zas kyi tha ma phul la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:25a-4: yid gnyis ci dang ci yod pa de dag kyang legs par zhus shig dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:25a-5: des khyed la lung bstan par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:25a-7: bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lus chen mtha' yas 'di btang ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:25a-8: byang chub sems dpa' grangs med pas bskor zhing mdun du bdar nas 'dir 'ongs pa de'i gzi brjid kyis khyod kyi 'od nyams par gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:25a-9: de 'ong ba la rjes su yi rang bar gyis shig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:25a-10: de bzhin gshegs pa nam mkha' dang mnyam pas bdag cag gi de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa mdzad pa la'ang ltos shig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:25a-12: de nas 'khor de dag thams cad kyis me long gi ngos la bdag gi gzugs mthong ba bzhin du 'jig rten gyi khams thag ring po na bzhugs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa de dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:25a-13: 'jig rten gyi khams de mthong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:25a-14: de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas 'khor de dag la 'di skad ces smras so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:25a-15: ji ltar khyod kyis 'jig rten gyi khams 'di dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:25a-16: de bzhin gshegs pa 'di mthong ba de bzhin du phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:25a-17: 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan dag kyang ltos shig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:25a-18: de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:25b-0: 'di ltar bdag @25b nyid che ba yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:25b-1: rang gi gnas na bzhugs bzhin du'ang khyed la zhal ston par mdzad do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:25b-3: kye ma de bzhin gshegs pa de ltar bdag nyid che ba'ang yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ba lta kyi hud ces bla zhing 'khod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:25b-4: de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lus chen mtha' yas byang chub sems dpa' dpag tu med pa dag gis bskor ba'ang mthong ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:25b-5: byang chub sems dpa' de'i lus kyi ba spu'i khung bu re re nas padma chen po byung ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:25b-6: padma chen po re re la'ang grong khyer bdun khri brgyad stong bdun khri brgyad stong yod la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:25b-7: grong khyer de dag kyang yul yangs pa can gyi thag gru tsam sha stag ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:25b-8: rin po che sna bdun gyi ra ba dang 'obs bdun rim gyis bskor ba shing ta la'i phreng ba bdun rim gyis mdzes par byas pa sha stag ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:25b-11: bde ba dang ldan zhing dga' dga' ltar 'dug la ra ba de dag kyang dzambu chu bo'i gser gyi ba gam chen po sha stag gis bskor te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:25b-12: ba gam thams cad kyi bar bar na'ang shing ljon pa gzhon sha can 'bras bu dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:25b-13: me tog dang ldan pa sna mang po dag yod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:25b-14: shing ljon pa de dag gi yal ga rlung gis bskyod pa las kyang sil snyan dga' bar byed pa'i sgra snyan zhing chags su rung ba 'byung ba sna lnga lnga sgrog ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:25b-15: sgra de dag gis sems can de dag rtse zhing dga' la >dga' mgur spyod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:26a-0: 'obs de dag thams cad kyang chu bsil zhing shel @26a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:26a-1: bzhin du dang bdag gis gang bar 'dug ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:26a-2: de dag gi nang kho ra khor yug tu sems can de dag rin po che'i gru dag gis dga' zhing rgyu bar byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:26a-3: chu de dag kyang padma dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:26a-5: ku mu da shing rta'i 'phang lo tsam sha stag gis brgyan to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:26a-6: 'obs kyi kho ra khor yug kyang skyed mos tshal gyi phreng bas mdzes par byas te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:26a-7: skyed mos tshal re re la'ang rdzing bu thag gru dpag tshad phyed pa lnga lnga yod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:26a-8: rdzing bu'i chu dag kyang padma dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:26a-10: ku mu da kha dog sna tshogs dri zhim po shing rta'i 'phang lo tsam sha stag gis khebs par 'dug la shing ljon pa me tog rgyas pa'i phreng bas mdzes par byas so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:26a-11: skyed mos tshal kho ra khor yug na'ang ngang ngur dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:26a-13: khrung khrung shug dag gis padma'i ze 'bru myang bar byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:26a-14: kho ra khor yug gi skyed mos tshal de dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:26a-15: de dag na'ang khang khyim dag yod la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:26a-16: khang pa re re la'ang chu zhed du dpag tshad bzhi bzhi yod de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:26a-18: gser dang dngul dang beed'urya dang shel las byas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:26a-20: ke ke ru las grub pa ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:26a-21: nor bu'i 'jo tshar gyis spel zhing snang bar byas pa'i mu tig gi do shal dpyangs pa dang ldan pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:26a-22: gser gyi rta babs chen po dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:26a-24: dra ba dag gis brgyan pa'i khang bzang mthon po sa gzhi ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:26a-25: gser gyi bye ma brdal ba dang ldan pa sha stag go //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:26b-0: rdzing bu rnams kyang @26b 'brul pa'i lam gser gyi them skas them pa bco brgyad dang ldan pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:26b-1: mtha' thog thag tu gser gyi chu shing gi phreng bas mdzes par byas pa'i lha'i tsandan gyi dri bsung can gyi chu dang ldan pa sha stag go //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:26b-2: grong khyer chen po de dag re re'i nang na'ang rgyal po brgyad khri bzhi stong brgyad khri bzhi stong yod de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:26b-3: de dag thams cad kyang bud med kyi tshogs dpag tu med pa dpag tu med pa dag gis bskor zhing 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga dang ldan te rtse zhing dga' la dga' mgur spyod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:26b-4: sems can gzhan dag kyang de dang 'dra ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:26b-5: sa phyogs ka tsa linda'i gos ltar reg na bde ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:26b-6: tsandan gyi chus chag chag btab pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:26b-7: me tog gi sil mas gtor ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:26b-8: gzhan dag na rtse zhing dga' la dga' mgur spyod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:26b-9: grong khyer chen po dag na theg pa chen po'i sgra ma gtogs par theg pa gzhan gyi sgra med do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:26b-10: padma chen po de dag la'ang sengge'i khri chen po rkang pa gser dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:26b-14: ka lingka'i ras kyis g-yogs pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:26b-16: 'jig rten gsum na phul du bya ba sha stag gis dkris te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:26b-17: sengge'i khri de dag la rgyal po de dag 'khod cing sems can gzhan dag theg pa chen po'i mdo sde rnams slob par byed de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:26b-18: rgyal po de dag gi mdun na la la ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:27a-0: de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lus chen mtha' yas kyi ba spu'i khung bu nas skyes pa'i padma dag la 'khod pa'i sems can @27a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:27a-1: de dag 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga'i dga' ba dang ldan yang de dag yongs su spangs nas mya ngan gyis gdungs te smre sngags 'don cing kyi hud kyi hud ces bla zhing 'khod de nyis 'gyur du mchod pa'i tshogs 'bul bar byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:27a-2: de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lus chen mtha' yas byang chub sems dpa' dpag tu med pas bskor te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:27a-3: de lta bu'i 'byor pa'i rnam pa dag ston cing mchod pa'i tshogs chen po dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:27a-4: zhal zas ches rgya che ba dag khyer te 'ongs nas zhal zas de dag dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:27a-5: padma de dag gi dri bsung tshor ba gang yin pa de dag kyang nyon mongs pa dang bral bar gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:27a-6: byang chub sems dpa'i mthu chen pos 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyang mthong bar gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:27a-7: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lus chen mtha' yas kyi lus kyi tshad kyang nam mkha' dang mnyam par 'dug ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:27a-8: sus kyang mthong bar mi nus so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:27a-9: de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lus chen mtha' yas bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du song ste zhabs la mgo bos phyag btsal nas thal mo sbyar te 'di skad ces gsol to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:27a-10: bdag gis phul ba'i zhal zas bcom ldan 'das kyis bzhes su gsol /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:27a-11: de nas bcom ldan 'das cang mi gsung bar gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:27b-0: lan gnyis lan gsum du gsol kyang bcom ldan 'das cang mi gsung bar bzhugs nas byang chub sems dpa' de langs te phyogs @27b gcig tu 'dug go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:27b-1: de bzhin du lho phyogs dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:27b-3: byang phyogs logs nas kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lus chen mtha' yas zhes bya ba 'khor gyi tshogs chen po dang ldan pa sha stag lhags te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:27b-5: grong khyer gyi tshad kyang snga ma snga ma las nyis 'gyur nyis 'gyur gyis che ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:27b-6: 'byor pa nyis 'gyur nyis 'gyur gyis che ba sha stag dang chas te; de dag der lhags nas bcom ldan 'das la padma dag gis mchod pa byas te snga ma bzhin du phyogs gcig tu 'khod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:27b-7: shing s'a la zung gi drung grub pa'i gnas de nyid na dkyil 'khor sum cu rtsa gnyis kyi tshad kyi khyon gyi sa gzhi la sems can mi 'khod pa'i sgo skabs ci'ang med do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:27b-8: de na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar lus che ba rang rang gi g-yog 'khor dag dang bcas pa de rnams kyang kha cig ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:27b-9: sa phyogs smyung bu'i rtse mo'i khyon tsam la 'khod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:27b-11: khab kyi rtse mo'i khyon tsam la 'khod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:27b-13: rdul phra rab kyi khyon tsam la bag yongs su 'khod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:27b-14: 'jig rten gyi khams rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed dag na byang chub sems dpa' 'khod pa gang yin pa de dag kyang thabs de lta bur lhags te 'khod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:27b-15: dzambu'i gling gi sems can yang tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:27b-16: gnas brtan kun dga' bo dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:27b-17: rgyal po ma skyes dgra rnams ma gtogs par der ma 'ongs pa su'ang med de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:27b-18: tha na mi gdug pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:28a-1: la sogs pa las mi bzad pa bcu drug byed pa yan chad kyang der lhags so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:28a-3: lha ma yin rtag tu 'khon gyi bsam pa can thams cad kyang sdig pa'i las spangs nas gcig la gcig bu dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:28a-5: sring mo dang 'dra bar sems par gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:28a-6: stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na 'khod pa'i sems can thams cad kyang gcig la gcig bu gcig pa la bya ba bzhin du byams par byed de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:28a-9: mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'di'ang de bzhin gshegs pa'i mthus bong ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:28a-13: tsher ma med par gyur te shing ljon pa rin po che'i 'khri shing gis dkris pa mnyen zhing reg na 'jam pa dag dang ldan zhing 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can dang 'dra bar gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:28a-14: sems can der lhags pa thams cad kyis kyang de na 'khod bzhin du ji ltar me long gi ngos la rang gi gzugs brnyan snang ba bzhin du rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:28a-15: sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'byor pa dang ldan pa gzhan dag kyang mthong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:28a-16: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhal nas 'od zer kha dog sna tshogs sngon po dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:28a-21: shel gyi kha dog lta bu dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:28b-0: me lce lta bu dag byung ba gang yin pa de dag gis bya ba gang yin pa de dag gi bya ba thams cad byas te phyir log nas bcom @28b ldan 'das nyid kyi zhal du zhugs te mi snang bar gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:28b-1: 'khor thams cad kyi 'od kyang des zil gyis gnon par gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:28b-4: lha ma yin dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis 'od zer de dag bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal du mi snang bar gyur pa mthong nas 'jigs shing skyi bur zhes byas te rgyu med par bcom ldan 'das kyi 'od zer rnams phyir log nas mi snang bar 'gyur ba'i mi rigs na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:28b-5: gor ma chag par phyogs bcu dag tu bya ba rnams zin nas da ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:28b-6: gdon mi za bar de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:28b-7: bcom ldan 'das kyis gang las kyang zhal zas ma bzhes na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:28b-8: kye ma sems can thams cad la tshad med pa bzhi spangs sam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:28b-9: ci smyung bar bzhugs par chad dam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:28b-10: kye ma ci nyi ma dang zla ba nub bam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:28b-11: ci dam pa'i chos kyi gru bying ngam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:28b-12: kyi hud kyi hud ces bla zhing 'khod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:28b-13: de nas de dag rang rang gi yan lag rnams rmas par byas pa'i khrag gis sa gzhi 'dam du gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:29a-0: chu klung gser ldan yang khrag tu 'bab par gyur to; ;de nas 'khor de dag gi nang na grong khyer ku shi pa mgar ba'i bu dge bsnyen skul byed ces bya ba de mgar ba'i bu bco lnga dang thabs cig tu langs te rang rang gi spyod lam bcos nas 'jig rten dag la bltas te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas pus mo g-yas pa'i lha nga sa la gtsugs te bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas mchi ma mi thub bzhin du zhabs la @29a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:29a-2: bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:29a-5: sems can thams cad nges par bsgral ba'i slad du bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dge slong gi dge 'dun dang bcas pa la zhal zas kyi tha ma dbul bar 'tshal te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:29a-8: rtsa lag ma mchis pa lags /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:29a-10: phongs te re ba lags na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:29a-11: bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag gis phul ba'i zhal zas bzhes te yongs su mya ngan las mi 'da' bar mdzad du gsol //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:29a-15: bram ze shin tu dbul po 'ga' zhig gzhan gyi yul du mchis la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:29a-16: bdag nyid spro ba bskyed de mthar gyis zhing las brtsams nas des rmon glang rmo skyen pa thong gshol dang sbyar ba dag gis zhing la rdo dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:29a-18: tshor ma ma mchis par bgyis te re ba chen po bskyed nas sprin chen po las chang 'bab pa la sdod cing mchis pa de bzhin du /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:29a-21: lus kyi zhing la nyes pa gsum dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:29a-22: bzhi dang bral ba'i yid dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:29a-23: ngag gi rmon glang dang shes pa'i thong gshol gyis nyon mongs pa rnam pa sna tshogs kyi rdo dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:29b-0: tsher ma ma mchis par bgyis nas khyod kyi chos kyi sprin chen po las chos kyi char 'bab pa la sdod cing mchis te dge slong gi dge @29b 'dun dang bcas par spyan 'dren na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:29b-1: bdag gi dbul ba bsal ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:29b-2: sems can thams cad la sman pa'i slad du bdag gis phul ba'i zhal zas bzhes su gsol /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:29b-5: skyabs ma mchis pa lags na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:29b-6: de bzhin gshegs pas bdag la sgra gcan zin bzhin du gzigs par gsol /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:29b-7: de nas bcom ldan 'das thams cad mkhyen pa rgyal ba gang zag bla na med pas mgar ba'i bu skul byed la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:29b-9: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis khyod kyi zhal zas tha ma sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa chen po bzhes par mdzad do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:29b-12: lha ma yin de dag gis skul byed kyis phul ba'i zhal zas kyi tha ma sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa chen po de bzhin gshegs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun dang bcas pas bzhes so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:29b-13: zhes thos nas ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i chos thob ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:29b-16: zhes skad chen po phyung nas mgar ba'i bu skul byed la 'di skad ces smras so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:29b-17: kye mgar ba'i bu skul byed /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:29b-18: khyod skyid de ba khyod kyis mi lus thob pa ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:29b-22: 'jig rten na au dum ba ra'i me tog bzhin du mdzes pa ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:29b-24: de bas kyang ches de bzhin gshegs pa 'byung ba rnyed par dka'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:29b-25: de bas kyang dad pa rnyed pa shin tu dka'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:30a-0: de bas kyang ches chos thos pa @30a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:30a-2: de bas kyang ches de bzhin gshegs pa la zhal zas kyi tha ma dbul ba rnyed par dka'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:30a-4: zhal zas kyi tha ma sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa thob par dka'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:30a-5: mgar ba'i bu skul byed khyod la phyag 'tshal lo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:30a-7: ston zla 'bring po nya la sprin med pa'i tshe zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dri ma med pa mdzes pa mthong ba na zla ba 'ba' zhig mngon du snang ba de bzhin du khyod kyis phul ba'i zhal zas kyi tha ma de bzhin gshegs pas bzhes pas na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:30a-8: khyod 'ba' zhig sems can thams cad la mngon du snang ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:30a-9: khyod la yang dang yang du phyag 'tshal lo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:30a-12: mi'i lus byed bzhin du lha'i yang lha yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:30a-13: de bzhin gshegs pa'i sras sgra gcan zin dang 'dra'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:30a-14: zhes byas nas tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag kyang smras so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:30a-15: khyod ni mi ma yin te lha mchog yin //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:30a-16: mi mchog gtso bo khyad par 'phags pa ste //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:30a-17: de phyir khyod la gsol ba 'di skad 'debs //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:30a-18: ston pa yongs su mya ngan 'da' bar chas //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:30a-19: bdag cag kun la brtse bas skul byed khyod //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:30a-20: skye bo rnams la yun du phan pa'i phyir //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:30a-21: 'dir ni ston pa dpag med mgon po la //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:30a-22: bzhugs shing rgyun du bdud rtsi ston ces gsol //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:30a-23: srid las rnam grol mya ngan 'da' bzhed la //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:30a-24: gal te khyod kyis de ring ma gsol na //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:30a-25: bdag cag thams cad ma rung shes par gyis //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:30a-26: de bas phan phyir mgon la gsol ba thob //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:30b-0: de nas la la zhig pha @30b ma gnyis shi ba las phyir sos te gson por 'dug pa mthong na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:30b-1: mchog tu dga' bar gyur pa de kho na bzhin du mgar ba'i bu skul byed de mchog tu dga' bar gyur nas lag pa brkyang ste bcom ldan 'das la mgo bos phyag btsal nas langs te tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:30b-2: kye ma deng bdag rnyed pa legs par rnyed //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:30b-3: mi yi 'jig rten skyes pa 'bras bu yod //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:30b-4: da ni rnyed la sogs las 'bral mi 'gyur //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:30b-5: mi bzad dmyal bar yang ni ltung mi 'gyur //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:30b-6: deng 'dir rnyed pa chen po rnyed pa 'di //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:30b-7: gser gyi phung po bas kyang lhag pa yin //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:30b-8: dpa' bo de gshegs mgon dang phrad pas na; ;phyin chad bdag ni dud 'gros 'jigs pa med //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:30b-9: sangs rgyas la ni dad pa gting zug pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:30b-10: deng rnyed au dum wa ra'i me tog bzhin //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:30b-11: rab 'jigs yi dvags 'gro ba yongs spangs shing //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:30b-12: lha min skye ba'i sa bon mi bzod bcom //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:30b-13: de bzhin gshegs 'byung dkon dang deng phrad pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:30b-14: khab kyi rtse mor yungs 'bru chags pa bzhin //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:30b-15: de la pha rol phyin mchog sbyin phul bas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:30b-16: rtag tu lha yi 'gro bar 'phar bar 'gyur //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:30b-17: chu gnas padma chus mi chags pa ltar //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:30b-18: drang srong chen po 'jig rten chos rnams kyis //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:30b-19: chags med phrad pas srid rtse'i sa bon kun //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:30b-20: drungs phyung bdag nyid 'khor ba'i mtsho chen rgal //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:30b-21: rgya mtsho'i nang gi rus sbal zhar ba'i mgrin //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:30b-22: gnya' shing mig tu chud dka' 'dra ba las //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:30b-23: bde gshegs deng phrad de la sbyin pa phul //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:31a-2: lha rnams kyis ni zhal zas bzang po dag /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:31a-3: phul yang bde gshegs ma bzhes bdag las ni //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:31a-4: ae randa yi me tog 'dra zhes des //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:31a-5: bdag ni 'jig rten rab mchog dpal yon can //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:31a-6: tshangs pa brgya byin la sogs 'jig rten 'di //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:31a-7: thams cad lhags te gus par bdag la mchod //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:31a-8: khyu mchog gnas su son pa gang yin 'di //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:31a-9: skye ba 'di nyid la ni bdag gis thob //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:31a-10: de nas thal mo sbyar te bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:31a-11: mgon khyod mya ngan 'da' ba mthong nas ni //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:31a-12: 'jig rten 'di kun sdug bsngal gzir bar gyur //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:31a-13: dbang med kyi hud ces ni skad cher bla //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:31a-14: 'di dag ma dor rtag tu sras bzhin gzigs //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:31a-15: lhun po'i gser gyi rtse mo rab mtho ba //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:31a-16: mtsho chen dbus na mdzes par gnas pa ltar //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:31a-17: chos kyi mnga' bdag khyod ni chos ston cing //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:31a-18: dge 'dun dbus su mdzes par bzhugs su gsol //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:31a-19: ji ltar nyi ma gzi can shar ba na //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:31a-20: 'od zer dag gis sprin srab sel ba ltar //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:31a-21: drang srong chen po ye shes sgron chen gyis //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:31a-22: skye bo mang po'i mya ngan deng bsal mdzod //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:31a-23: sems can 'di dag dud mos mig skrangs shing //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:31a-24: sdug bsngal gcig bu'i rgya mtsho'i gting du zhugs //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:31a-25: de phyir dad pa rnyed dka' bskyed mdzad cing //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:31a-26: 'di rnams sdug bsngal chod la yun du bzhugs //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:31a-27: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis skul byed la bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:31b-5: au du ma wa ra'i me tog bzhin shin tu rnyed par dka'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:31b-7: chos thos pa'ang rnyed par dka'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:31b-8: de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba'i tshe zhal zas kyi tha ma'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa phun sum tshogs pa'ang rnyed par dka'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:31b-11: mya ngan ma byed par bdag gis de bzhin gshegs pa la zhal zas kyi tha ma'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa phun sum tshogs pa thob bo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:31b-12: snyam du dga' ba skyed cig dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:31b-13: de bzhin gshegs pa la bcom ldan 'das bzhugs su gsol zhes de skad du khyod gsol ba ma 'debs shig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:31b-14: sangs rgyas rnams kyi chos kyi de kho na nyid la rtogs shig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:31b-15: mi rtag pa nyid la 'jug par gyis shig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:31b-16: 'du byed rnams kyi rang bzhin shes par gyis shig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:31b-17: ces bka' stsal nas tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsungs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:31b-18: tshe ni shin tu ring yang 'jig par 'gyur //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:31b-19: 'dir ni thams cad nges par 'chi bar 'gyur; ;'tsho ba'i 'jig rten 'jig pa'i chos can yin //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:31b-20: 'byor pa thams cad rgud par gzhol bar 'gyur //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:31b-21: rtag tu lang tsho rga bas nges par 'joms //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:31b-22: gzugs bzang nad med nad kyis 'jig par 'gyur //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:31b-23: srog ni 'chi bas rtsa nas 'byin par byed //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:31b-24: 'jig rten kun na rtag pa ci yang med //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:31b-25: dbang phyug mi rtag tshe yang mi rtag ste //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:31b-26: skye bo sdug bsngal 'khor lo rtag tu 'khor //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:32a-1: rten gsum na brtan po ci yang med //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:32a-2: srid pa dag na 'gro kun srog tu 'dug /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:32a-3: srid pa 'jig pa'i chos can rab g-yo ba //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:32a-4: 'di dag na ni bde ba ci yang med //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:32a-5: rga dang 'chi dang nad dang rgud rnams kyi //
