K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:32a-6: 'jigs pas rtag tu kun nas gtse bar byed //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:32a-7: srid pa mtha' med mi brtan snying po med //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:32a-8: thams cad dgra dang 'khu bar shes par gyis //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:32a-9: de na 'khor zhing nyon mongs dra ba yis //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:32a-10: 'jig rten dkris te dar gyi srin bu bzhin //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:32a-11: 'jig rten dag na ther zug gnod pa'i gzhi //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:32a-12: rtag tu 'bras ltar sdug bsngal 'brel ba gang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:32a-13: mi gtsang lus dang 'dod pa de dag la //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:32a-14: phan 'dod sdug bsngal bsal 'dod su zhig dga'//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:32a-15: mi rtag 'dod pa rnams la chags pa med //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:32a-16: tshul bzhin rtog pas 'dod chags 'bral bar 'gyur //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:32a-17: de nas yang dag mthong na 'dod chags 'bral //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:32a-18: de dag spangs bcad grol pa nyid du 'gyur //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:32a-19: da ni srid pa'i chu chen legs par rgal //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:32a-20: nga ni sdug bsngal rnams 'das bde bar zhugs //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:32a-21: de phyir ngas ni mtha' yas spros med pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:32a-22: chags pa kun bsal thar pa thob par 'gyur //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:32a-23: nga la rga dang na dang 'chi ba med //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:32a-24: nga la rtag tu tshe yang zad pa med //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:32a-25: nga ni me ltar 'bar te 'gro 'gyur gyis //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:32a-26: khyod kyis nga ni med 'gyur ma sems shig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:32a-27: de bzhin gshegs nyid lhun po 'dra bar ltos //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:32a-28: nga deng yang dag mya ngan 'da' bar 'gyur //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:32a-29: bde mchog de ni nga yi chos nyid de //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:32b-0: rgyal rnams spyod yul yin gyi @32b khyed ma ngu //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:32b-1: de nas bcom ldan 'das la mgar ba'i bu skul byed kyis 'di skad ces gsol to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:32b-8: bdag gis kyang bsam gyis mi khyab lags na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:32b-9: sbrang bu dang 'dra ba'i sems can theg pa dman pa gzhan dag gis lta smos kyang ci 'tshal /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:32b-11: kye ma bdag deng du byang chub sems dpa' mi mchog skal ba chen po dang ldan pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:32b-12: mchod par 'os pa 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la sogs pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:32b-13: zag pa zad pa rnams dang mnyam pa nyid du gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:32b-15: gsar du bsnyen par rdzogs pa gzhon nu'ang rab tu byung ba de nyid kyi nyin par nas dge 'dun gyi nang na dge 'dun gyi nang na dge 'dun du bgrang zhing yang dag par 'dus par 'gyur ba de bzhin du bdag kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i mthus byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi grangs su gtogs shing yang dag par 'dus lags so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:32b-18: de bzhin gshegs pa yun du bzhugs par 'tshal gyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:32b-19: kha zas tshig pa bzhin du mya ngan las 'da' bar gshegs par ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:32b-21: de nas de'i tshe 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas mgar ba'i bu skul byed la 'di skad ces smras so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:32b-24: de bzhin gshegs pa yun du bzhugs par 'tshal gyi //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:33a-1: du mya ngan las 'da' bar gshegs par ni mi 'chal lo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:33a-2: zhes de skad ma zer cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:33a-3: 'du byed kyi rang bzhin blta bar bya mod /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:33a-4: de ltar lta ba gang yin pa de ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:33a-5: stong pa nyid sgom pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:33a-6: dam pa'i chos 'dod pas na de ltar bslab par bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:33a-9: 'o na ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa lha'i yang lha mchog tu gyur pa la gal te 'du byed du gyur na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:33a-10: lha'i yang lhar 'os pa ma yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:33a-12: chu bur bzhin du shes shing shing rta'i 'phang lo bzhin du 'khor ba yin no; ;lha rnams ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:33a-13: mchog tu tshe ring zhes grag la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:33a-17: de bzhin gshegs pa lha'i yang ltar 'os pa ma yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:33a-19: mi la la zhig grong dpon byed pa las de mthar gyis dbang phyug chen por gyur nas blon po chen po'i dbang phyug las kyang 'das te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:33a-20: rang gi dbang phyug gi 'bras bu chos kyis rnyed pa la longs spyod pa las de phyir yang bsod nams zad cing dbang phyug las nyams par gyur na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:33a-21: gzhan gyis bkol zhing brnyas par 'gyur pa ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:33a-23: dbul por gyur pa'i phyir ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:33a-24: de dang 'dra bar gal te de bzhin gshegs pa 'du byed du gyur du zin na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:33a-25: 'chi ba'i rgyu yin pa'i phyir lha'i yang lhar 'os pa ma yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:33a-26: btsun pa 'jam dpal de bas na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:33b-0: @33b lha'i yang lha de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la de ltar 'du byed dang 'dra bar ma lta zhig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:33b-2: gzhan yang ci khyod shes bzhin du /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:33b-3: de bzhin gshegs pa la 'du byed kyi rang bzhin du rtog par byed dam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:33b-4: 'on te ma shes pas rtog par byed /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:33b-5: gal te de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa 'du byed dang 'dru na ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:33b-6: 'jig rten gsum po dag na chos kyi dbang phyug rnyed pa lha'i lha mdzad pa'i 'os ma yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:33b-8: rgyal po'i dbang po la la zhig la gyad stong gi mchog tu gyur ba'i gyad cig yod la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:33b-9: de gyad thams cad kyis mi thub pa'i phyir gyad stong thub ces bya ba'i ming thob ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:33b-10: de la gyad zla med pa'i phyir bla nas dbang thang chen po 'grub na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:33b-11: ci gyad stong thub pa de'i ming de thos na skad grags pa de mi bden pa yin nam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:33b-12: 'on te yon tan yod na ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:33b-13: yon tan can gyi ming thob pa yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:33b-14: de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'ang nyon mongs pa'i bdud dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:33b-17: rang bzhin gyi bdud kyi gyad thams cad bcom pas na; gyad stong thub bzhin du yang dag pa'i yon tan gyi sgo nas 'jig rten gsum po dag tu de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas zhes bya ba yin gyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:33b-19: khyod de bzhin gshegs pa la 'du byed dang 'dra bar yongs su ma rtog cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:33b-21: la la zhig phyug cing nor mang ba'i rigs su skye ba blangs la tshe thung bar 'gyur ba zhig ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:34a-0: @34a *// de skar mkhan dag gis mthong nas khye'u 'di ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:34a-3: de'i pha mas de skad thos na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:34a-5: bdag cag gi khyim du phan par 'gyur ba ma yin no; ;snyam nas grangs su'ang mi rtsi zhing de la byams par mi byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:34a-10: gang tshe thung ba de la khyad du gsod par gyur na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:34a-11: gal te de bzhin gshegs pa chos 'ba' zhig la yang dag par gzhol ba nyid 'du byed du gyur du zin na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:34a-12: 'jig rten thams cad kyis brnyas par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:34a-13: chos thams cad kyi nang na ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:34a-14: phyir ltung ba med cing zad pa med pa la thar pa zhes bshad na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:34a-15: gal te de ltar gyur na don med par gyur gyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:34a-17: de bzhin gshegs pa 'du byed du gyur ces de skad du ma gsung zhig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:34a-19: bud med gzhon nu dbul mo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:34a-23: bar ma dor sdug bsngal bar gyur pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:34a-24: sbrum pas nyen pa zhig mgon med pa khang pa zhig tu song ba las bu mo de bu byung nas de na snga nas gnas pa gzhan dag gis de de'i nang nas bskrad de nyon mongs ma de bu btsas ma thag tu byis pa kha dmar khyer nas lo legs pa'i yul zhig tu chas te song ba las lam du sha sbrang dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:34a-28: sdig sbrul gyi gnod pas nyen par gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:34a-29: gangg'a'i klung chen po rgal bar 'dod pa las de rgal bar ma nus so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:34b-0: @34b khye'u de khyer bzhin du gangg'a'i nang du shi nas de bu de la byams pa'i bsod nams kyi khyad par gyis lus dang bral te shi ba'i 'og tu tshangs pa'i 'jig rten du skyes te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:34b-1: byams pa'i bsod nams kyi khyad par ji lta bu zhig gis skyes sha na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:34b-4: khye'u 'di nye zho med par thar par bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:34b-5: snyam pa'i bsod nams kyi khyad par gyis skyes pa de bzhin du /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:34b-6: btsun pa 'jam dpal; skyes bu dam pa dam pa'i chos dbyung bar 'dod pas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:34b-7: de bzhin gshegs pa 'du byed du gyur par blta bar mi bya zhing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:34b-8: 'du shes kyang bsgyur bar mi bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:34b-9: gal te de lta bu'i mig lus la med na'ang bcom ldan 'das ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:34b-11: snyam du yang dag pa'i lta ba can du bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:34b-12: sems can thams cad la phan pa'i gdams ngag ston pas ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:34b-13: de bzhin gshegs pa 'dus ma byas pa yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:34b-15: dam pa'i chos 'byin par byed pas ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:34b-16: ji ltar bud med gzhon nu dbul mos gangg'a'i klung las bu bsgral ba'i phyir rang gi srog dang bsdos te 'bad pa de bzhin du bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:34b-17: dam pa'i chos dbyung ba'i thabs bya ba'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:34b-19: snyam du sems bskyed par bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:34b-20: de bzhin gshegs pa 'dus ma byas par mthong na bdag nyid kyis don du bya ba'i thar pa'i don rtogs par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:35a-0: mi la la zhig lam du 'gro bas dub par gyur te khyim gyi nang du @35a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:35a-1: nyal ba las de'i tshe khyim de thog thag nas me chen po 'bar te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:35a-5: snyam nas ngo tsha shes pa dang khrel yod pa dang ldan pas bdag nyid gos kyis dam du dkris te sems dran pa dang ldan bzhin du shi nas de ngo tsha shes shing khrel yod par sems pa'i bsod nams kyi 'bras bus sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i rgyal srid de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:35a-9: mi'i 'jig rten du'ang 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal srid lan du ma byas te ngan song rnams su'ang mi skye la lan mang du bde ba gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa 'ba' zhig thob pa de bzhin du /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:35a-11: khyod skyes bu dam pa dag ltar 'dzem par gyis shig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:35a-12: ngo tsha shes par gyis shig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:35a-13: de bzhin gshegs pa 'du byed kyi thabs la 'jug pa spyod du ma gzhug cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:35a-14: dge slong tshul khrims phun sum tshogs pa de bzhin gshegs pa 'dus ma byas pa la de bzhin gshegs pa 'dus byas yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:35a-16: mu stegs par gyur te shi'ang bla'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:35a-17: de bzhin gshegs pa 'dus ma byas yin bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa 'dus byas yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:35a-18: zhes zer pa gang yin pa de dag ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:35a-19: brdzun du smra ba yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:35a-20: de bzhin gshegs pa 'dus byas pa yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:35a-22: rang gi khyim dang 'dra bar sems can dmyal bar 'gro bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:35b-0: btsun pa 'jam @35b dpal; de bzhin gshegs pa la 'dus byas dang 'dra bar ma lta zhig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:35b-1: da phyin chad 'khor bar rgyu ba na mi shes pa la bzlas te bcom ldan 'das ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:35b-3: snyam pa'i shes pa 'ba' zhig rtogs par gyis shig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:35b-4: de ltar byas pa dang sgom pa de'i 'bras bus khyod myur ba kho nar de bzhin gshegs pa bzhin du mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang ldan par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:35b-5: de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:35b-6: mgar ba'i bu skul byed la 'di skad ces smras so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:35b-11: de ltar bya ba yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:35b-13: khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs pa rtag pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:35b-17: da ltar khyod kyis 'di kho na ltar 'dus byas khong brlag tu btang ba'i sgo nas shes pa las na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:35b-18: khyod kyang ring po mi thogs par de bzhin gshegs pa ji lta ba bzhin du 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:35b-19: sangs rgyas nyid kyis kyang de ltar 'u bu cag gnyis kyis khyad par du 'phags pa'i bsngags pa brjod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:35b-22: de bzhin gshegs pa'i bshos myur cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:35b-23: sbyin pa thams cad kyi nang na ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:35b-24: smyur te sbyin pa mchog yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:35b-25: de la smyur te sbyin na zhes bya ba ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:35b-26: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad kyi sa bon las myu gu 'byung bar bya ba'i phyir gang gi tshe dge slong dam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:36a-0: don 'ga' zhig gi phyir lam du zhugs nas @36a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:36a-1: dub par gyur pa de dag la ci yod pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:36a-3: brtags pa'i sbyin pa byed pa de ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:36a-4: smyur te sbyin pa zhes bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:36a-6: de bzhin du khyod kyis ci yod pa las zhal zas kyi tha ma mang yang rung /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:36a-8: de bzhin gshegs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun dang bcas pa khyed par yod kyang rung /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:36a-9: khyed par med kyang rung ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:36a-11: bcom ldan 'das yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar gshegs su nye'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:36a-12: de nas skul byed kyis smras pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:36a-14: khyod kha zas la chags sam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:36a-15: ci na zhal zas mang yang rung /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:36a-18: ces bdag gi gzhen 'debs par byed /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:36a-19: bcom ldan 'das kyis lo drug gi bar du dka' ba spyod pa mdzad mdzad na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:36a-20: ci da skad cig tsam yang gzhes mi spyod dam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:36a-23: zhal zas kyi sku ma yin na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:36a-24: ci bcom ldan 'das zhal zas gsol lam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:36a-25: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:36a-26: 'jam dpal; skul byed kyis ji skad smras pa de ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:36a-32: theg pa chen po la shes rab che ba'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:36a-34: theg pa chen po la shed byed pa'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:36a-35: 'jam dpal gyis kyang 'di skad ces smras so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:36a-36: gal te de ltar bzhed par gyur na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:36a-37: de bzhin gshegs pa sku tshe ring bar shog cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:36b-0: ci bdag 'ba' zhig la @36b bcom ldan 'das mnyes sam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:36b-1: 'on te sems can thams cad la'ang mnyes /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:36b-3: ci bcom ldan 'das lta khyod dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:36b-5: sems can thams cad la'ang mi mnyes sam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:36b-8: gang la mgu ba yod pa de la phyin ci log gi 'du shes yod de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:36b-11: de bzhin gshegs pa la ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:36b-12: mnyes pa'am dgyes pa med do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:36b-13: 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:36b-14: ba be'u la byams pa'i phyir rtsva zos shing zos shing grong nyid du 'ong ba de lta bu'i byams pa dang ldan pa ma yin gyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:36b-15: sems can thams cad la'ang sgra gcan zin dang 'dra bar gzigs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:36b-16: sangs rgyas kyi shes rab kyi yul ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:36b-20: rta cang shes dang sbyar ba'i shing rta rgyug pa'i zla la bong bu'i shing rta rgyug pa mi srid pa de bzhin du 'u bu cag bong bu'i shing rta dang 'dra ba dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i shes rab dang 'dra ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:36b-21: dgongs pa'i tshig dang mnyam du 'gro bar nus re skan /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:36b-23: nam mkha' lding dpag tshad du mar 'gro ba nam mkha' la gnas pas chu'i nang na nya dang rus sbal 'khod pa rnams me long gi ngos la rang gi gzugs brnyan snang ba bzhin du gsal bar mthong yang byis pa rnams kyis ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:36b-24: mig mi gsal ba'i phyir de'i mig gi rtsal brjod par mi nus pa de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'i yang de dang 'dra'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:37a-4: byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi che ba nyid gleng ba'i phyir de skad du brgal bar zad do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:37a-5: de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal nas 'od zer rnam pa sna tshogs bkye nas de dag gi 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i lus la phog go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:37a-6: de nas 'jam dpal gyis de rtogs nas mgar ba'i bu skul byed la smras pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:37a-8: de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar rings kyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:37a-9: dus su bcom ldan 'das la bshos 'brim du chug cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:37a-11: rgyu med par bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal nas 'od zer rnams 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:37a-12: de nas skul byed cang mi zer bar 'dug go //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:37a-13: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis skul byed la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:37a-15: nga yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gror nges /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:37a-16: dge slong gi dge 'dun la dus su zas 'brim du chug cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:37a-17: ces lan gnyis lan gsum du bka' stsal to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:37a-18: de nas skul byed kyis 'di skad smras so; ;kye ma bcom ldan 'das mi bzhugs na ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:37a-20: bdag cag thams cad kyis du zhing bcom ldan 'das la gsol ba gdab bo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:37a-21: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis skul byed la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:37a-24: de ltar lus la rma ma 'byin cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:37a-25: mi'i lus la chu shing bzhin du snying po med par rtogs shig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:37b-2: rdza mkhan gyis byas pa'i snod dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:37b-3: glog lta bur khong du chud par gyis shig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:37b-5: nyes pa grangs med pa'i 'byung gnas yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:37b-6: snyam du shes par gyis shig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:37b-7: 'dus byas kyi rang bzhin la ltos shig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:37b-8: de nas bcom ldan 'das la skul byed kyis 'di skad ces gsol to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:37b-10: bdag dang sems can thams cad la thugs brtse ba'i slad du de bzhin gshegs pa yun ring du bzhugs su mi gnang na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:37b-11: bdag ci'i slad du mi ngu lags /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:37b-14: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis skul [?] byed la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:37b-16: khyod la snying brtse ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:37b-17: sems can thams cad la snying brtse ba'i phyir yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar byed de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:37b-19: sangs rgyas rnams kyi chos nyid dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:37b-21: 'du byed thams cad mi rtag go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:37b-22: zhes bya ba'i tshigs su bcad pa khong du chud par gyis shig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:37b-24: 'du byed dang 'dres pa'i phyir sdug bsngal ba'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:37b-34: nyes dmigs mtha' yas pa dang ldan pa'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:37b-35: snyam du shes par gyis shig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:37b-37: dbu ba dang 'dra bar ltos la ma ngu zhig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:37b-39: de nas bcom ldan 'das la skul byed kyis 'di skad ces gsol to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:38a-3: ha cang sdug bsngal chen po mi bzod lags so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:38a-4: bcom ldan 'das thabs kyis yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar mdzad pa la ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:38a-5: bdag glo ba rangs lags so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:38a-6: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:38a-11: nga'i mya ngan las 'das pa thabs de ltar blta bar bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:38a-14: bya bzhad gzas la 'gro ba lta bur shes par gyis shig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:38a-17: tshe ring ba ma yin pa'i rtags shes par gyis shig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:38a-22: chos thams cad la thabs kyi chos can yin la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:38a-23: de rnams kyis kyang gos par mi 'gyur ba de ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:38a-24: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi rang bzhin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:38a-26: khyod srid pa'i rgya mtsho las nges par brgal bar bya ba ni phyir zhal zas smyur te 'on cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:38a-29: mi rnams kyis kyang nga la rang rang gi mchod pa byas nas mi g-yo ba'i bde ba thob par gyur cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:38a-30: khyod kyis kyang snod du gyur pa la dus su sbyin pa gyis shig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:38a-34: de bzhin gshegs pa zhes bya ba ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:38a-35: don tha dad pa ma yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:38b-0: de nas skul byed kyis sems can thams cad nges par bsgral ba'i phyir mgo smad de mchi ma @38b blags nas gsol pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:38b-3: bcom ldan 'das kyis ji skad bka' stsal pa de bzhin du bdag gis bgyi'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:38b-4: de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i 'og tu ji ltar blta ba de ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:38b-5: bdag cag sbrang bu dang 'dra ba rnams kyi yul yang ma lags /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:38b-6: nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi yul yang ma lags so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:38b-8: de nas mya ngan byed cing du bzhin du g-yog 'khor dang bcas pas bcom ldan 'das la bskor ba byas te mchod pa chen po'i las byas nas bcom ldan 'das dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:38b-9: 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag btsal te zhal zas len du song ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:38b-10: 'phags pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa theg pa chen po'i mdo /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:38b-12: de nas de'i tshe sa chen po g-yos /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:38b-27: de la sogs pa byas te mi mkhris pa'i nad kyis brgyal ba'i gnod pas thebs pa bzhin du sa chen po 'di rgya mtsho dug can pa'i mthas gtugs pa tshangs pa'i 'jig rten man chad thog thag tu rab tu g-yos so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:39a-0: mi de dag thams cad mgo rmongs te 'jigs shing skyi bung zhes byas nas du bzhin du chig mthun par tshigs su bcad @39a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:39a-2: mgon po khyod la bdag cag rnams //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:39a-4: rgyal ba khyu mchog khyod dang ni //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:39a-5: bral na bdag cag mgon med 'gyur //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:39a-6: deng khyod mya ngan 'da' 'gyur 'di bsam na //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:39a-7: bdag cag sdug bsngal shin tu gting zab bying //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:39a-8: thub pa bdag cag snying ni stor bar gyur //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:39a-9: ba gzhon rkun khyer be'u la chags pa bzhin //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:39a-10: mgon med dbul po'i mi ni la la zhig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:39a-11: nad kyis thabs la sman pa med pa dang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:39a-12: rang dgar byed cing kha zas gnod pa rnams //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:39a-13: za ba ji ltar 'chi bar 'gyur ba bzhin //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:39a-14: skye bo 'di dag nyon mongs nad kyis thabs //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:39a-15: khyod med khyod kyi chos kyi gsos med pas //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:39a-16: lta ba'i nyes pa bye 'drar 'chi bar 'gyur //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:39a-17: de bas phan phyir 'jig rten ma dor cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:39a-18: ji ltar grong khyer rgyal dang bral ba dang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:39a-19: dbul po rnams la mu ge byung ba dang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:39a-20: ji ltar dgon par skom gyis gdungs pa bzhin //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:39a-22: sems can gces khyod mya ngan 'da' bzhed pas //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:39a-23: sa gzhi rab tu g-yos shing phyogs kyang tshol //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:39a-24: rgya mtsho chen po dag kyang rnam par 'khrugs //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:39a-25: bdag cag kun kyang sdug cing bsngal bar gyur //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:39a-26: drang srong chen po deng khyod mya ngan las //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:39a-27: 'das na nyi ma'ang sa la stung yang dag /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:39a-28: rgya mtsho chen po dag kyang skam par 'gyur //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:39b-0: bdag cag kun @39b kyang deng du 'gum lags grang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:39b-1: ji ltar stobs ldan mis ni sgo gseb nas //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:39b-2: glang chen khyer te nang du 'dzul bgyid na //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:39b-3: shin tu nyon mongs 'gyur ba de bzhin du //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:39b-4: bdag cag thams cad rab tu nyon mongs gyur //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:39b-5: ji ltar bu gcig 'gum par mi 'tshal zhing //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:39b-6: mya ngan khyod 'da' bdag cag de mi 'tshal //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:39b-7: gal te khyod ni mya ngan 'da' ba las //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:39b-8: mi gzhes bdag cag thams cad phongs par 'gyur //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:39b-9: khyod ni mya ngan 'das lam gshegs mthong bas //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:39b-10: dud 'gro mang po'ang g-yar ngan cher bgyid na //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:39b-11: bdag cag ji ltar g-yar ngan mi 'tshal lags //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:39b-12: bdag cag mchil ma bzhin du ma dor cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:39b-13: nyi ma 'char kar rang gi 'od gsal bas //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:39b-14: mun nag rnam par bcom pa de bzhin du //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:39b-15: 'phrul can khyod kyis sdug bsngal mun bsal te //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:39b-16: dge 'dun dbus su ri rab bzhin du bzhugs //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:39b-19: rgyal po la la zhig gi bu sdug cing phangs pa zhig mchis la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:39b-20: des de chos lugs kyi bstan bcos bslab nas 'di sod cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:39b-21: ces bka' stsal pa de bzhin du bdag cag bcom ldan 'das dam pa'i chos kyi 'khor los bsgyur ba'i sras rnams kyang yang dag pa'i lta ba bskyed nas bkum gyis ma mchis na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:39b-23: rgyal po'i bu ji lta ba de bzhin du bdag cag mi 'gum par bcom ldan 'das de'i slad du yun ring du bzhugs su gsol //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:40a-0: ji ltar la la zhig gzhung gis rtsod pa'i @40a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:40a-1: bstan bcos la brten pa na skrag par 'gyur ba de bzhin du khyod kyis skrag par ma mdzad cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:40a-2: de kho na nyid mkhyen bzhin du bdag cag sems can dmyal bar mchi bar ma mdzad cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:40a-3: dam pa'i chos kyi bdud rtsi'i bcud kyis tshim par mdzad cing de bzhin gshegs pa yun ring du bzhugs su gsol //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:40a-4: ji ltar rgyal po'i btson rar gnod pa'i las rnams kyis dang po nyon mongs pa la la la zhig gis khyod kyis na tsha ji lta bu zhig myong zhes smras na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:40a-8: gang gi tshe bdag sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba las thar par 'gyur ba de'i tshe mya ngan las 'das pa yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:40a-9: bde ba nyams su myong bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:40a-10: zhes mchi ba de bzhin du bdag cag thams cad kyang khyod bzhugs nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:40a-11: rgyal po'i btson ra nas thar pa bzhin du mya ngan las 'das pa lags na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:40a-12: de'i slad du de bzhin gshegs pa yun ring du bzhugs su gsol //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:40a-15: sman pa tshe'i rig byed yan lag brgyad la mkhas pas bdag gi bu la ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:40a-16: rgyud phyi ma slob par bgyis kyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:40a-18: bdag dang mnyam par 'gyur du dogs nas slob par mi bgyid pa de bzhin du chos kyi rgyal po sman pa chen po ser sna mi mnga' ba khyod kyis theg pa chen po'i rgyud phyi ma la de ltar mi mdzad par bcom ldan 'das yun ring du bzhugs su gsol //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:40b-0: de bzhin du shing rta la @40b shing rta'i rig byed la mkhas pas bdag gi bu la ni //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:40b-1: rgyud phyi ma sgra grags par phog pa'i dpyad thams cad slob par bgyid kyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:40b-3: slob par mi bgyid pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:40b-4: rig pa'i gnas gzhan dag la'ang de bzhin du sbyar ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:40b-9: nad pa la la zhig lam bzang po las gol te lam ngan par mchis na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:40b-10: shin tu sdug bsngal bar 'gyur ba de bzhin du /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:40b-12: sems can lam ngan par mchis pa rnams lus dang bral ba'i 'og tu sems can dmyal ba rnams su sdug bsngal myang bar 'gyur lags na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:40b-13: bcom ldan 'das lam ston pa yun ring du bzhugs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:40b-14: ya mtshan can dgu bcu rtsa drug dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:40b-15: tshigs u bcad pa bzhi bcu rtsa lnga la'ang de bzhin du rgyas par sbyar ro; ;de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:40b-17: khyed lha dang mi rnams ltar byis pa'i smre sngags 'don pa dag ma byed par brtson 'grus rtsoms shig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:40b-18: de nas lha dang lha ma yin dang mi rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das kyi gsung blo gros dang ldan pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:40b-19: de kho na nyid du 'gro ba thos nas ji ltar bu gcig pa shi nas dur khrod du bor ba bzhin du de dag sdug bsngal bar gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:40b-20: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de dag la tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:40b-21: khyed rnams nges par bder gyur cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:40b-22: mya ngan ma byed ma du zhig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:41a-1: chos; ;thams cad mi smra 'khod par gyis //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:41a-2: bag med par ni ma gnas par //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:41a-3: bag yod pa la dga' bar gyis //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:41a-4: khyed stong pa dang stong pa ma yin pa'am /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:41a-5: rtag pa dang mi rtag pa'am /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:41a-6: skyabs dang skyabs ma yin pa'am /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:41a-8: rten dang rten ma yin pa'am /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:41a-9: ther zug dang ther zug ma yin pa'am /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:41a-10: brtan pa dang brtan pa ma yin pa'am /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:41a-11: sems can dang sems can med pa'am /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:41a-12: yang dag pa dang yang dag pa ma yin pa'am /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:41a-13: bden pa dang bden pa ma yin pa'am /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:41a-14: mya ngan las 'das pa dang mya ngan las 'das pa ma yin pa'am /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:41a-15: gsang ba dang gsang ba ma yin pa'am /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:41a-16: gnyis dang gnyis su med pa'am /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:41a-17: de bzhin du chos rnam pa du ma dag la som nyi'am /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:41a-19: the tshom za ba ci dang ci yod pa de dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:41a-20: de dag nga la zhus shig dang thams cad gcad par bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:41a-21: bdud rtsi'i mchog kyang khyed la bstan par bya ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:41a-22: de'i 'og tu yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:41a-24: sangs rgyas 'byung ba rnyed par dka'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:41a-25: mi'i lus thob pa rnyed par dka'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:41a-26: dad pa phun sum tshogs pa rnyed par dka'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:41a-27: bzod pa dang tshul khrims phun sum tshogs pa ma zhig ma ral pa'ang shin tu rnyed par dka'o; ;'jig rten na dgra bcom pa thob pa ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:41a-29: au dum wa ra'i me tog bzhin du rnyed par dka'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:41b-0: thams cad kyi sgo nas sems @41b can thams cad kyi 'tsho ba yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:41b-1: de bzhin du nga'i chos bstan pa rnam pa sna tshogs gsang ba thar pa'i grong khyer gyi bdud rtsi'i zas kyang de dang 'dra bar blta bar bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:41b-2: sems can thams cad dang nga'i sras dge slong thams cad la dam pa'i chos mang po brtan por bzhag go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:41b-3: gzhan yang sems can thams cad la phan pa'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan che ba nyid bsgrags te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:41b-4: yi ge 'bru gcig pa'i thig le'i gtam yang bzhag nas yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:41b-5: de nas dge slong de dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'da'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:41b-6: zhes thos nas mi dga' gyur te; skyi bung zhes byas nas mig mchi mas gang bzhin du bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te bcom ldan 'das la lan mang du bskor ba byas nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:41b-7: bcom ldan 'das kyis sdug bsngal ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:41b-10: rjes thams cad kyi nang na glang po che'i rjes ches mchog yin par bstan to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:41b-12: de ltar mi rtag pa'i 'du shes bsten cing bsgoms te mang du bgyis pas 'dod pa'i 'dod chags thams cad zad par 'gyur /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:41b-13: gzugs kyi 'dod chags thams cad zad par 'gyur; gzugs med pa'i 'dod chags thams cad zad par 'gyur /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:41b-14: ma rig pa thams cad zad par 'gyur /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:41b-15: lhag pa'i nga rgyal thams cad ma lus pa yang dag par chad par 'gyur ba lags so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:42a-2: ston gyi dus su zhing pas rmos cher btab ste rtsa ba 'dzings pa thams cad sel bar bgyid pa de bzhin du /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:42a-3: bcom ldan 'das mi rtag pa'i 'du shes bsten cing bsgoms te mang du bgyis pas 'dod pa'i 'dod chags thams cad zad par 'gyur /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:42a-4: gzugs kyi 'dod chags thams cad zad par 'gyur /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:42a-5: gzugs med pa'i 'dod chags thams cad zad par 'gyur /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:42a-6: ma rig pa thams cad zad par 'gyur /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:42a-7: lhag pa'i nga rgyal thams cad ma lus par yang dag par zad par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:42a-8: zhing slas thams cad kyi nang na ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:42a-9: ston gyi zhing slas mchog tu bstan to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:42a-10: zhes bya ba la sogs pa glang po che'i rjes lta bu'i mdo las 'byung ba bzhin du rgyas par sbyar ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:42a-13: rgyal po 'chi ba'i tshe ba dag gi btson ra bsal te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:42a-14: sems can rnams btson ra'i gnod pas snyon smongs pa las thar par bgyis nas de'i 'og tu 'chi bar bgyid pa de bzhin du /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:42a-16: khyod kyis kyang sems can mi shes pa rnam pa sna tshogs kyi btson rar brubs pa rnams kyi mi shes pa'i 'ching ba rnams bcad nas de'i 'og tu yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar gshegs su gsol /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:42b-0: sha za'i gdon gyis brlams pa las @42b sman pa chen po dang phrad na 'byung po dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:42b-1: sha za'i gdon rnams kyis thebs pa thams cad las thar par 'gyur ba de bzhin du khyod dang mjal na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:42b-2: nyan thos kyi tshogs thams cad mi shes pa rnam pa sna tshogs kyi 'byung po dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:42b-3: sha za'i gdon rnams las yongs su thar par 'gyur la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:42b-4: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid khong du chud par bgyid lags so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:42b-7: glang po che'i 'dul sbyong gi mkhan pos spos kyi glang po che zhags pa chen pos bcings pa las glang po che'i zhags pa de bcad de bros pa de bzhin du /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:42b-9: bdag cag kyang bdag tu 'dzin pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:42b-14: g-yo'i zhags pa chen po bcad nas glang po che'i 'dul sbyong gi mkhan po de bzhin gshegs pa'i lag tu 'ongs na sems can thams cad las nyon mongs pa'i glang po lnga bcu rtsa bdun yongs su bsal bar bgyi'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:42b-17: grang ba'i rims kyis thebs pa sman pa chen po'i thad du mchis na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:42b-18: sdug bsngal las thar par 'gyur ba de bzhin du /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:42b-20: bdag cag kyang nyon mongs pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:43a-0: log pa'i 'tsho ba'i nyes dmigs mtha' yas pa'i grang ba'i rims nad can gyi lus dang ldan pa las sman pa chen po bcom ldan @43a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:43a-1: 'das kyi thad du mchis nas sdug bsngal thams cad las rnam par thar par gyur te mi g-yo ba'i bde ba'ang thob lags so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:43a-4: mi zhig gis 'bras skyems 'tshal te ra ro bar gyur nas bdag nyid kyis kyang bdag nyid ma 'tshal te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:43a-14: phyi sa dang gcin gyis rang gi lus kun bsgos shing mchis pa las de'i 'og tu bdag nyid sangs te gzhi ci las gyur pa la mkhas par gyur nas chang ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:43a-18: sdig pa thams cad las thar to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:43a-19: snyam nas chang btung ba cir yang mi rung bar shas cher bsgoms te spong bar bgyid pa de bzhin du /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:43a-22: zlos gar mkhan bzhin du thog ma ma mchis pa nas 'khor ba na 'khor zhing yongs su 'khyams pa na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:43a-29: snyam du ma 'tshal nas ma dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:43a-31: bu mo rnams dang lhan cig tu 'dod pa'i 'du shes spyod par bgyid de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:43b-0: 'bras skyems kyis ra ro bar gyur pa de bzhin du sdug bsngal rnyed par gyur @43b la; de nas ngo tsha shes pa'i mi de dag 'bras skyems kyis ra ro ba las sangs pa bzhin cir yang mi rung bar shas cher bsgoms nas sdug bsngal las yang dag par 'da' bar 'gyur lags so; ;gzhan yang ae randa la ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:43b-1: snying po mchis mi srid pa de bzhin du lus 'di la'ang bdag dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:43b-7: byed pa po mchis mi srid de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:43b-8: de lta bur bdag cag gis bdag ma mchis pa'i 'du shes bsgoms te mang du bgyis lags so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:43b-10: phub ma skon pa bye ba snyed bor ba ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:43b-11: cir yang mi gces pa de bzhin du lus 'di la'ang bdag ma mchis so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:43b-13: kha sral gyi me tog la dri bda' ba ma mchis pa de bzhin du lus 'di la'ang bdag ma mchis te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:43b-14: de ltar bdag cag gis bdag ma mchis pa'i 'du shes bsgoms te mang du bgyis lags so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:43b-15: bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang dge slong dag /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:43b-19: de ltar bsgoms pa rnams kyis bdag tu 'dzin pa spang par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:43b-20: bdag tu 'dzin pa yongs su spangs na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:43b-21: mya ngan las 'das pa thob par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:43b-24: de ltar chos thams cad bdag ma mchis pa'i slad du bdag ma mchis pa'i 'du shes bsgoms te mang du bgyis lags so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:44a-0: gzhan yang ji ltar nam mkha' la bya'i rjes @44a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:44a-2: mi srid pa de bzhin du bdag ma mchis pa'i 'du shes bsgoms na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:44a-3: lta ba'i rnam pa thams cad dang bral bar 'gyur lags so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:44a-4: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:44a-5: bsgom pa de ltar sgom pa khyed kyis shes sam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:44a-6: dge slong rnams kyis gsol pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:44a-10: bdag med pa'i 'du shes de ma lags pa bsgoms na ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:44a-11: ji ltar mi ra ro zhing 'khyams pas lha khang dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:44a-17: ri rnams mi 'khor bzhin du 'khor bar mthong ba de bzhin du gang dag gis sdug bsngal dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:44a-19: bdag med pa'i 'du shes ma bsgoms pa'i sems can 'jig rten pa de dag ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:44a-20: ra ro ba dang 'dra bar blta bar bgyi'o /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:44a-23: yang dag par bsgoms lags so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:44a-24: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:44a-27: dpe 'di'i don de ngas bshad par bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:44a-28: khyed kyis tshigs su bcad pa'i don 'di la don ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:44a-32: zhes gsal bar mi shes te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:44a-33: ji ltar mi ra ro bas lha khang dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:44a-39: ri rnams mi 'khor bzhin du 'khor bar mthong ba de bzhin du 'du shes phyin ci log du mas zin cing kun tu rmongs pa rnams bdag go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:44b-3: snyam pa'i 'du shes kun tu spyod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:44b-4: de la bdag ces bya ba ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:44b-5: sangs rgyas zhes bya ba'i don to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:44b-7: chos kyi sku zhes bya ba'i don to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:44b-9: mya ngan las 'das pa zhes bya ba'i don to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:44b-11: chos kyi tshig bla dvags so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:44b-17: bdag med pa'i 'du shes bsgoms lags so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:44b-19: nga rgyal gyis dregs par ma byed cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:44b-20: de ltar rnam pa gsum bsgoms par gyur na ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:44b-21: nga'i bstan pa la khyed kyis sgom pa rnam pa gsum bsgoms pa de sgom pa don med par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:44b-22: sdug bsngal shes par bya ba sgom pa rnam pa gsum po ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:44b-24: khyad par gyi'ang khyad par ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:44b-28: bde ba la sdug bsngal lo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:44b-31: mi rtag pa la rtag go //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:44b-33: phyin ci log pa'o; ;rtag pa la mi rtag go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:44b-36: bdag med pa la bdag tu 'du shes pa ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:44b-38: bdag yod pa la bdag med par 'du shes pa ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:44b-40: mi sdug pa la sdug go //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:44b-43: sdug pa la mi sdug go //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:45a-0: phyin ci log bzhi po 'di dag yang dag @45a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:45a-1: par ma shes par khyed kyis bsgom par bya ba bsgoms te mang du byas so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:45a-2: khyed kyis bde ba la sdug bsngal bar bsgoms so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:45a-3: rtag pa la mi rtag pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:45a-4: bdag yod pa la bdag med pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:45a-5: sdug pa la mi sdug par bsgoms so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:45a-6: 'jig rten pa rnams la'ang bde ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:45a-10: 'jig rten las 'das pa rnams la'ang bde ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:45a-14: 'di la phan tshun mi mthun pa yod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:45a-15: yi ge zhes bya ba ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:45a-16: 'jig rten pa zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:45a-17: don ces bya ba ni; 'jig rten las 'das pa'i ye shes so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:45a-18: de nas bcom ldan 'das la dge slong rnams kyis 'di skad ces gsol to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:45a-20: 'du shes bzhi la sogs pa phyin ci log de bzhin gshegs pas lus su bzhag pa rnams ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:45a-21: bdag cag gis yun ring mo zhig nas mthong yang mthong /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:45a-23: da ji ltar 'tshal ba bka' stsal du gsol; de bzhin gshegs pa bskal pa'am /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:45a-24: bskal pa las lhag par yang bzhugs su gsol /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:45a-25: de bzhin gshegs pas ci dang ci skad du bka' stsal pa de dag de dag de bzhin du bdag cag gis bgyi bar 'tshal lo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:45a-26: gal te de bzhin gshegs pa bzhugs su mi gnang na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:45a-27: bdag cag kyang sbrul gdug pa dang khyim gcig gi nang du lhan cig mchis pa mi 'tshal te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:45b-0: @45b de bzhin gshegs pa mi bzhugs na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:45b-1: tshangs par spyod cing mchis pa'i rngo mi thogs kyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:45b-2: khyod nyid kyi slad bzhin du bdag cag kyang yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'tshal lo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:45b-3: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi dge slong de dag la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:45b-5: khyed de skad ma zer cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:45b-7: ngas 'od srung gi lag tu bstan pa gtad par bya ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:45b-9: de bzhin gshegs pa dang 'dra bar dge slong rnams kyi rten lta bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:45b-10: dge slong rnams dang sems can rnams kyi skyabs lta bur 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:45b-12: rgyal po grong khyer mang po'i mnga' bdag grong khyer zhig tu song ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:45b-13: khyim bdag cig rgyal por dbang bskur ba de bzhin du 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir ngas 'od srung chen po la dbang bskur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:45b-18: mi sdug pa'i 'du shes ji ltar bsgom zhe na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:45b-21: so ka'i dus la bab pa na skye bo rnams kyis nags tshal gyi nang du chu bskyil te rang rang gi rkyal ba'i yo byad thogs nas chu'i nang du rtse bar byed la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:45b-22: chu de'i nang du gcig gis nor bu rin po che beed'urya rigs dang ldan pa zhig bzhag nas beed'urya de 'dod pa'i phyir de dag thams cad kyis rkyal pa rnams bor te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:45b-23: chu de'i nang du 'dzul nas de'i nang na gyo mo'am gseg ma ci yod pa dag la nor bu yin snyam ste blangs nas nor bu bdag gis rnyed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:46a-0: zhes zer zhing so so nas @46a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:46a-4: snyam pa'i 'du shes skyes par gyur la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:46a-5: rdzing bu de'i chu'ang nor bu'i 'od kyis zla ba'i 'od bzhin du mdzes par 'dug ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:46a-6: de dag gis mdzes pa de mthong nas ae ma nor bu snyam du yon tan gyi 'du shes skye bar 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:46a-7: de dag gi nang nas thabs la mkhas shing yid rno ba zhig gis nor bu de yang dag par rnyed pa de bzhin du /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:46a-9: khyed kyis thams cad sdug bsngal ba'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:46a-13: zhes thams cad kyi mu bzung nas bsgoms shing mang du byas pa gang yin pa de dag thams cad rdzing gi nang gi gyo mo dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:46a-14: gseg ma bzhin du nor zhing don med par gyur ta re /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:46a-15: skyes bu thabs la mkhas pa bzhin du gyis shig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:46a-16: khyed kyis thams cad kyi mu bzung nas gang dang gang bsgoms pa de dang de nyid la bde ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:46a-20: rnam pa bzhi po de dag ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:46a-21: phyin ci ma log pa zhes brjod par bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:46a-23: nor bu dang 'dra bar chos kyi de kho na nyid rtag pa'i 'du shes sgoms shig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:46a-24: de nas bcom ldan 'das la dge slong rnams kyis 'di skad ces gsol to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:46a-25: bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong dag /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:46a-29: de ltar sgom pa rnams kyis ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:46b-0: bdag tu 'dzin @46b pa spong bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:46b-2: mya ngan las 'das pa thob par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:46b-4: bka' stsal pa de'i don ji lta bu lags /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:46b-6: de bzhin gshegs pas de'i rnam par dbye ba bka' stsal du gsol /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:46b-7: bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong de dag la bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:46b-12: bdag gi the tshom nges par gcad par 'dod pas ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:46b-13: de skad ces dri dgos te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:46b-17: grong khyer 'ga' zhig na rgyal po shes rab 'chal ba zhig rgyal po byed de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:46b-18: rgyal po de la sman pa ngan pa zhig bdog la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:46b-19: de'ang sman pa 'chal ba zhig ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:46b-20: bla nas dbang thang cher dbang la rgyal pos kyang bkur ba zhig yod pa des 'o ma 'ba' zhig sman yin par 'dzin la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:46b-22: mi shes nas 'o ma'i dpyad log par zin pa de skye ba thams cad kyi rlung nad kyi sna grangs rnams la'ang gtong bar byed /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:46b-24: bad kan gyi nad rnams la yang gtong bar byed de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:46b-25: de de ltar byed kyang sman pa gces pa kho nar 'gyur la rgyal po de'ang 'chal ba'i bye brag mi phyed pa zhig go //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:46b-26: de nas sman pa tshe'i rig byed yan lag brgyad la mkhas pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:46b-27: rgyud phyi ma shes pa gzhan zhig yul gzhan nas gsar du 'ongs nas sman pa de'i thad du rten bcas te smras pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:46b-28: khyod kyi ming thos nas slob par 'tshal ba'i slad du bdag mchis kyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:47a-0: khyod kyis bdag gi mkhan po @47a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:47a-2: de nas sman pa 'chal ba des de skad ces thos nas sman pa gsar du 'ongs pa de la smras pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:47a-3: lo bzhi bcu rtsa brgyad kyi bar du nga la legs par bsgrims te dka' ba spyad pas rim gro gyis la de'i 'og tu slobs shig dang khyod sman par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:47a-4: de nas des de bzhin du mnyan te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:47a-6: zhes byas nas des mthar gyis sman pa 'chal ba de mgu bar byas te rgyal po'i pho brang du song nas rgyal po de la 'di skad ces gsol to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:47a-8: khyed kyis rtag tu bstan bcos thams cad la brtson par mdzod cig dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:47a-14: zhes byas nas rgyal po des sman pa 'chal ba de dang sman pa gcig shos kyi bye brag phyed par gyur nas sman pa ngan pa de yul phyogs nas bskrad de sman pa bzang po gcig shos bkur bar gyur la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:47a-15: de nas sman pa des da ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:47a-17: snyam nas rgyal po la 'di skad cas gsol to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:47a-19: gal te bdag la mnyes par gyur na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:47a-20: gsol ba sna gcig gsol gyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:47a-21: gal te rgyal po chen po'ang dgyes pa lta na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:47a-23: rgyal pos sman pa la bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:47a-24: nga'i lag pa g-yas pa man chad nor re cog las gsol cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:47a-25: sman pas rgyal po la gsol pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:47a-26: rgyal po chen po'i sman pa 'chal ba de'i 'o ma'i dpyad gang lags pa de ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:47b-0: @47b dug ha la ha la lags na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:47b-1: des glo bar ma chud kyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:47b-2: rgyal po khyod kyi yul khams thams cad du bkas btags la sngon gyi sman pa de'i 'o ma'i dpyad gang yin pa de ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:47b-3: dug ha la ha la yin gyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:47b-4: su sman du 'o ma 'thung ba de mgo bo gcad do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:47b-7: sems can rnams dus ma yin pa'i 'chi bas 'chi bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:47b-10: nad ma mchis par 'gyur bar 'tshal te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:47b-14: de nas rgyal pos sman pa de la bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:47b-16: gsol ba chung ngu zhig gsol te bka' gdags par bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:47b-17: zhes byas nas bka' yang btags so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:47b-18: de nas bka' btags pa bzhin du thams cad du lugs su chud par gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:47b-19: de nas sman pa des rgyal po de la'ang 'di skad ces gsol to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:47b-20: da dung yang lan gnyis lan gsum gyi bar du de bzhin du bka' gdags par gsol zhes byas nas sman pa de ro mngar ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:47b-25: kha ba rnams kyis mi rnams kyi nad sos par byas so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:47b-26: de nas re zhig na rgyal po nad kyis thebs nas sman pa de bkug ste bsgo ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:47b-29: rgyal po'i rkyen dang 'tsham pa'i gsol ba ci 'dod pa khyod la sbyin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:47b-31: de nas sman pa des rgyal po de la gsol ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:47b-34: brdzun du smra ba lags so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:48a-1: kyi zhal zas 'o ma dang sbyar ba gsol 'tshal lo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:48a-2: de nas rgyal po des sman pa de la bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:48a-3: ci khyod mkhris pas myos par byas sam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:48a-4: 'on te nga slu bar byed dam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:48a-9: 'o ma sman gyi mchog yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:48a-11: kye ma sman pa snga ma bskrad pas phung ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:48a-12: des kyang 'o ma'i dpyad bsngags pa las na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:48a-13: de ni sman pa chen po yin gyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:48a-14: sman pa ngan pa ma yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:48a-15: khyod kyis 'o ma'i dpyad byas pa ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:48a-16: khyod bdag bskrad pa'i rgyu yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:48a-20: de ltar gzhan du mi dgongs par gsol //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:48a-23: rtsig pa la srin bus brkos te yi ge'i 'bru 'dra bar gyur pa mthong yang mkhas pa rnams gyis srin bus yi ge shes so /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:48a-25: yi ge sbyar ba lta bur gyur kyang ya mtshan du gzung bar mi bgyi ba de bzhin du /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:48a-26: khyod kyi sman pa snga ma'i 'o ma'i dpyad kyi las kyang srin bus brkos pa'i yi ge bzhin du blta bar bgyi ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:48a-28: 'o ma so so'i bye brag kyang ma 'tshal ba lags so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:48a-29: rgyal pos sman pa de la smras pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:48a-30: kva'i sman pa ngan pa des 'o ma so so'i bye brag ji ltar mi shes /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:48a-36: de la bdud rtsi zhes bgyi ba ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:48a-37: ba gang be'u ha cang stobs dang ldan pa ma lags pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:48b-0: chang @48b gi snyigs ma mi 'thung ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:48b-3: chu 'dam rdzab can na mi gnas pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:48b-4: ba lang rdzis nu ma ma bzhibs pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:48b-5: rtsva brngas pa mi gzan pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:48b-6: rang gi khyu na 'dug pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:48b-7: ma he'i khyu dang lhan cig mi 'grogs pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:48b-8: de la sogs pa'i yon tan rnams dang ldan la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:48b-9: de'i 'o ma lhag ma zag ma bcad par ran tsam bzhos pa'i 'o ma de ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:48b-10: nad do cog zhi bar bgyid pa lags so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:48b-11: de nas rgyal po ngo mtshar du gyur nas sman pa de la bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:48b-14: ngas khyod kyi 'o ma'i dpyad bzang po'ang shes so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:48b-15: ngan pa'ang shes so; ;de nas rgyal pos bka' btags te 'o ma 'thung zhig ces bsgo ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:48b-16: 'bangs thams cad kyis rgyal pos phyir yang 'o ma 'thung zhig ces bsgo ba thos nas sems 'khrugs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:48b-17: ci rgyal po gdon gyis thebs sam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:48b-18: 'on te bdag cag la mtho 'tsham mam zhes zer zhing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:48b-19: de ltar grong khyer gyi mi dang 'bangs thams cad rgyal po'i drung du lhags te rgyal pos de dag mthong nas smras pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:48b-23: khyed gsher ci yod ces byas so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:48b-26: 'bangs thams cad mgu bar gyur nas sman pa la mi mtshungs pa'i bsnyen bkur byas nas 'o ma'i dpyad la yang bsten par byed pa de bzhin du /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:49a-0: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig @49a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:49a-1: pa dang zhabs su ldan pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:49a-4: skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba bla na med pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:49a-5: lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sman pa bzang po dang 'dra bar 'jig rten du byung nas mu stegs pa sman pa ngan pa dang 'dra ba thams cad kyi thad du gshegs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:49a-6: thams cad nges par btul zhing nges par bshig nas rgyal po du ma mgu bar mdzad de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:49a-7: mu stegs pa rnams tshar gcad pa'i phyir bdag med do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:49a-12: mu stegs pa rnams kyis bdag bstan pa ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:49a-13: srin bus brkos pa'i yi ge dang 'dra ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:49a-14: de'i phyir ngas sems can thams cad la bdag med do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:49a-15: zhes bstan pa ston par mdzad do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:49a-17: sangs rgyas kyi tshig yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:49a-18: zhes chos kyi bka' 'dogs par mdzad nas yang gdul bar bya ba rnams kyi dbang dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:49a-19: sems can rnams la phan pa'i phyir dus mkhyen par mdzad nas chos thams cad bdag med par bstan pa'i skabs de nyid du sman pa bzang po bzhin du bdag yod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:49a-20: zhes yang dag par ston par mdzad de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:49a-21: 'jig rten pa rnams kyi bdag mthe bo tsam dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:49a-22: khre rgod kyi 'bru tsam zhes bya ba de lta bu ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:49a-24: 'jig rten pa rnams kyi bdag tu lta ba gang yin pa de lta bu yang ma yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:49b-2: bdag med pa'ang ma yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:49b-15: zhes sman pa bzang po'i 'o ma bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'ang de kho na nyid dang ldan pa ston par mdzad de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:49b-16: de sgom pa la 'khor bzhi po rnams kyis brtson par gyis shig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:49b-18: gzhan yang tshul khrims kyi gzhi ma gtogs par the tshom dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:49b-19: som nyi ci dang ci yod pa de dag khyed kyis nga la zhus shig dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:49b-20: ngas legs par gsungs pas khyed rangs par bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:49b-22: sgom pa thams cad las grol ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:49b-23: rang bzhin gyis stong pa chen po ston te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:49b-24: dge slong khyed de bzhin gshegs pas bdag cag la rang bzhin gyis ston pa chen po ma bstan to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:49b-25: zhes de skad ma zer cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:49b-27: gzhan yang tshul khrims kyi gzhi ma gtogs par the tshom dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:49b-28: som nyi ci dang ce yod pa de dag khyed kyis nga la zhus shig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:49b-29: de nas dge slong de dag gis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:49b-30: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la zhu ba ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:49b-31: bdag cag gi yul ma lags te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:49b-32: bdag cag gis rngo mi thogs lags so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:49b-33: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyang bsam gyis mi khyab /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:49b-34: ting nge 'dzin rnams kyang bsam gyis mi khyab /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:50a-0: khyod kyi gdams ngag kyang bsam gyis mi khyab pas @50a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:50a-1: na; bdag cag gis zhu ba'i rngo mi thogs lags so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:50a-4: mi la la rgas shing 'khogs la gtugs pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:50a-5: lo brgya nyi shu rtsa drug lon pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:50a-7: mal khri la mchis pa'i nad pa zhig mchis la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:50a-8: mi la la zhig gis de'i sug par gter gtams te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:50a-9: kye mi khyod kyis gter 'di longs la gang gi tshe bdag lo bcu'am lo nyi shu na phyes nas phyir 'ongs pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:50a-10: de'i tshe 'di bdag la phyir byin cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:50a-11: ces bgyis nas des gtad de mchis la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:50a-12: rgan po de'ang bu ma mchis pa zhig ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:50a-13: mi de mchis nas ring po ma lags par mi rgan po de gum na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:50a-15: de de ltar nor gyi phung po chen po dang bral bar gyur kyang su la'ang ji skad bgyir yang ma mchis pa de bzhin du bcom ldan 'das /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:50a-16: tshul khrims kyi gzhi ma gtogs par bdag cag gis zhus pa de'ang nyan thos la yun ring du gnas par mi 'gyur la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:50a-17: bdag cag la'ang ji skad du zhu ba'i cha ma mchis lags so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:50a-18: bcom ldan 'das kyis de dag la bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:50a-19: dge slong rnams kyis zhus pa ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:50a-20: sems can thams cad la phan par 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:50a-21: de'i phyir ngas zhu ba'i skabs phye ba yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:50a-22: de nas dge slong rnams kyis 'di skad ces gsol to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:50a-25: mi gzhon nu la la lo nyi shu rtsa drug lon te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:50b-0: @50b phyug cing 'khor phun sum tshogs pa dang ldan pa zhig mchis la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:50b-1: mi la la zhig gis de'i sug par gter gtams te 'di skad du kye bdag ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:50b-3: bdag phyir 'ongs pa dang mi khyod kyis gter 'di bdag la phyir byin cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:50b-4: ces bgyis nas mi des gter de legs par sbas shing legs par bsrungs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:50b-5: da slar mchis nas slar stsal pa de bzhin du bcom ldan 'das; dam pa'i chos kyi dbyig legs par gsungs pa dge slong kun dga' bo la sogs pa nyan thos thams cad la gtad na ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:50b-6: yun ring du gnas par mi 'gyur lags so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:50b-7: de ci'i slad du zhe na; 'od srung chen po la sogs pa nyan thos thams cad ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:50b-9: byang chub sems dpas zhus pa'i dbyig byang chub sems dpa' rnams la gtad na ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:50b-10: lo 'bum phrag mang por gnas par 'gyur la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:50b-11: 'phel bar yang 'gyur zhing byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la'ang sman par 'gyur lags so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:50b-12: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:50b-13: de bzhin gshegs pa la zhu ba'i rngo thogs la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:50b-14: bdag cag sbrang bu dang 'dra bas ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:50b-15: de bzhin gshegs pa la zhu ba'i rngo mi thogs lags so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:50b-16: zhes gsol nas cang mi zer bar 'khong do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:50b-17: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong de dag la 'di skad ces bka' stsal te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:50b-22: khyed zag pa med pas ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:50b-23: de skad bya ba yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:51a-2: de skad bya ba yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:51a-5: ngas kyang khyod kyis bsam pa'i don de snga nas bsam mo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:51a-6: nga'i theg pa chen po ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:51a-7: byang chub sems dpa'i lag tu gtad na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:51a-8: rgyu gnyis kyis yun ring du gnas par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:51a-9: de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor rnams la bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:51a-10: rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo tshe ring po dag /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:51a-11: gzhi gsum ma gtogs pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:51a-12: tshul khrims kyi gzhi ma gtogs par khyed kyi yid gnyis dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:51a-14: the tshom ci yod pa nga la zhus shig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:51a-15: ces lan gnyis lan gsum du bka' stsal to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:51a-16: de nas 'khor de nyid kyi nang nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sdong bu'i grong du skyes pa bram ze'i rigs che zhing mtho ba'i bu 'od srung chen po dang rus gcig pa zhes bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa'i mthus stan las langs te bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song nas phyag btsal te lan 'bum bskor ba byas nas lha'i mchod pa'i las chen po byas te bla gros phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas pus mo g-yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:51a-17: gal te zhus nas zhu ba lung bstan pa'i slad du bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la skabs phye na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:51a-19: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la bdag phyogs 'ga' zhig zhu'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:51b-0: @51b bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:51b-1: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bram ze'i rigs che zhing mtho ba'i bu 'od srung chen po dang rus gcig pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:51b-2: khyod ci dang ci 'dod pa de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la zhus shig dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:51b-3: ngas zhu ba zhus pa de dang de lung bstan pas khyod kyi sems rangs par bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:51b-4: de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bram ze'i rigs che zhing mtho ba'i bu 'od srung chen po dang rus gcig pas 'di skad ces gsol to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:51b-6: de bzhin gshegs pa'i mthu dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:51b-7: sems can thams cad kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba'i mthus bdag gis zhu bar mi 'tshal na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:51b-11: tsandan lta bu'i 'khor chen po dang ldan pa lags /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:51b-12: sengge lta bu'i 'khor chen po dang ldan pa lags /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:51b-14: rdo rje chen po ltar mi phyed pa'i sku mnga' ba lags /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:51b-15: mi phyed pa'i 'khor dang ldan pa lags /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:51b-16: ye shes rgya mtsho dang ldan pa'i 'khor chen po mnga' ba lags /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:51b-17: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kha cig yon tan dpag tu ma mchis pa dang ldan pa dag kyang mchis te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:51b-18: de ltar dpag tu ma mchis pa'i 'khor mnga' ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa la de bzhin gshegs pa'i mthus bdag gis zhu ba'i rngo thogs par gyur na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:51b-19: 'dir bgyi ba mang du mchis te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:52a-1: pa'i mthus bdag sbrang bu dang 'dra bas zhu bar 'tshal lo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:52a-2: zhes byas nas tshigs su bcad de gsol pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:52a-3: thub pa cis na tshe ring 'gyur //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:52a-4: rdo rje lta bur cis 'gyur lags; ;gang gis mi shigs thob par 'gyur //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:52a-5: cis na lus brtan stobs chen 'gyur //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:52a-6: ji ltar bgyis na mdo sde 'di'i //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:52a-7: pha rol phyin par 'gyur ba lags //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:52a-8: ji ltar srog chags rnams kyi sems /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:52a-9: sna tshogs rtogs nas ston par 'gyur //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:52a-10: thub pa chen po ji ltar na //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:52a-11: rgya chen thob nas skyabs su 'gyur //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:52a-12: ji ltar dgra bcom ma lags kyang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:52a-13: dgra bcom rnams dang mtshungs par 'gyur //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:52a-14: bcom ldan ji ltar bgegs bgyid pa'i //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:52a-16: bdud kyi tshig kyang 'tshal ba dang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:52a-17: rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gsung yang 'tshal; ;'dren pa ji ltar dga' bzhin du //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:52a-19: dge dang yang dag ldan gyur nas //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:52a-20: phyin ci ma log ston par 'gyur //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:52a-21: thub pa chen po ji ltar na //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:52a-22: legs byed 'gyur ba bstan du gsol //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:52a-23: thub pa byang chub sems rnams kyis //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:52a-24: ji ltar brtag dka' khams mthong 'gyur //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:52a-25: thub pa ji ltar yi ge yi //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:52a-26: phyed ni rdzogs par 'gyur ba lags; ;ji ltar bzhad dang zal mo yi //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:52a-28: ji ltar phur bu pa sangs //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:52a-29: nyi ma dag tu skye bar 'gyur //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:52a-30: thub pa byang chub sems dpa' rnams //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:52b-0: ji ltar @52b sems ni ma skyes par //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:52b-3: ji ltar rtsod dus skyes pa na //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:52b-4: gos pa ma mchis bgyid pa dang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:52b-5: nyes pa'i dbyings su padma ltar //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:52b-6: nyes dag gis mi gos lags //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:52b-7: ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' rnams //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:52b-8: yul khams sman pa chen por 'gyur //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:52b-10: de 'dir bdag la lung bstan gsol //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:52b-11: ji ltar sbrul rnams pags pa rnying //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:52b-13: rin chen mang po'i 'byung gnas dang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:52b-15: brtan po de dag nyan thos dang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:52b-16: rang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub kyis //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:52b-17: sku gdung ji ltar ston par bgyid //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:52b-18: mtha' yas sgo yang ji ltar ston //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:52b-19: rgyal sras brtul zhugs brtan po rnams //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:52b-20: ji ltar mi phyed 'khor dang ldan //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:52b-21: de dag 'jig rten dmus long ba'i mig dang 'dra bar ji ltar 'gyur //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:52b-22: thub pa chen po ji ltar na //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:52b-23: mgo mang bye ba ston par 'gyur //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:52b-24: ji ltar zla ba tshes 'dra bar //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:52b-25: 'jig rten rnams la chos kyang ston //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:52b-26: ji lta bur ni gzha' gsang du /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:52b-27: yongs su mya ngan 'das pa ston //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:52b-28: ji ltar lha dang bdud 'dra bar //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:52b-30: ji ltar chos kyi sgo rtogs nas //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:52b-32: ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' rnams //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:52b-33: nad med par yang 'gyur ba lags //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:52b-34: sems can kun la sman pa'i phyir //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:52b-35: de dag ji ltar dgongs pa 'chang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:52b-36: ji ltar dge ba lhag mar bcas //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:53a-0: ji ltar the tshom spong bar 'gyur @53a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:53a-1: blo gros chen po ji ltar na //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:53a-2: byang chub mchog tu nye bar 'gyur //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:53a-3: cha phra gzigs ba khyod nyid kyis //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:53a-4: byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa gsungs //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:53a-5: chos rnams du ma'i sgo dag kyang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:53a-6: 'dren pa khyod kyis bka' stsal cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:53a-7: sems can kun gyi sman pa po //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:53a-8: rkad gnyis rnams la sman ston cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:53a-9: thub pa'i phung po 'di dag las //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:53a-10: bdag gis zhu ba'i yul ma mchis; ;byang chub sems dpa' brtan rnams kyi //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:53a-11: yul ni thams cad mkhyen pa lags //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:53a-12: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bram ze'i rigs che zhing mtho ba'i bu 'od srung chen po dang rus gcig pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:53a-17: khyod ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsang ba'i mdo chen po las thams cad mkhyen pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:53a-18: thams cad mkhyen pa nang 'dri bar mdzad pa bzhin du 'dri ba ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:53a-20: 'jig rten gyi khams gangg'a'i klung mang po grangs med pa'i bye ma snyed kyi pha rol na thams cad mkhyen pa rang rang gi 'jig rten gyi khams na bzhugs pa dag nga dang thabs cig tu byang chub kyi shing drung du byang chub kyi phyir rol te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:53b-0: byang chub tsam pas de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsang ba bstan pa'i don du byang chub kyi phyir rol ba de bzhin du khyod kyang sems can thams cad la phan pa'i phyir yon tan ming gcig pa'i tshul thams cad mkhyen pa'i yul 'dri zhing @53b 'dug go //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:53b-1: de nas bcom ldan 'das la 'od srung chen po dang rus gcig pas 'di skad ces gsol to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:53b-4: thams cad mkhyen pa'i yul zhu ba'i rngo mi thogs mod kyi cung zad cig zhu bar 'tshal lo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:53b-7: sbrang bus gnam dang rgya mtsho'i pha mthar mchi ba'am /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:53b-8: rgya mtsho'i chab 'tshal ba'i rngo thogs pa de ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:53b-14: rgya mtsho dang 'dra zhing ye shes zab mo chos dang ldan pa lags so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:53b-16: rgyal po'i gtsug gi nor bu dkor bas rang gi spyi bos blang ba de bzhin du bdag gis kyang chos bka' stsal pa yang dag par blang bar 'tshal na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:53b-17: shes rab rgya bskyed pa'i slad du bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal du gsol /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:53b-18: bcom ldan 'das kyis mtshungs pa med pa yongs su bshad du gsol /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:53b-20: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa; rigs kyi bu nyon cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:53b-21: las gang gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshe ring bar 'gyur ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:53b-22: las gang gis byang chub kyi rgyur 'gyur ba de gzung ba'i sems kyis nyon cig dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:53b-24: byang chub kyi rgyu skye bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:53b-25: thos nas kyang gzhan dag la ston cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:54a-0: ngas kyang las de byas shing gzhan dag la'ang bstan pas bla na med pa yang @54a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:54a-1: dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob par gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:54a-4: mi la la zhig bu gcig pa thar par bya ba'i phyir rgyal po'i btson ra'i nang du 'gro ba de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' tshe ring bar 'dod pas kyang sems can thams cad la bu gcig pa'i 'du shes bsgom par bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:54a-6: 'tshe ba thams cad spong bar 'gyur la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:54a-10: btang snyoms chen po dang ldan par 'gyur zhing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:54a-11: srog gcod pa spong bar 'gyur ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:54a-13: rigs kyi bu; gzhan yang sems can dpag tu med pa dag bslab pa'i gzhi la 'god par 'gyur /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:54a-14: dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la'ang 'god par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:54a-20: las mi bzad pa byed pa'i sems can rnams nges par bsgral ba'i phyir 'gro ba thams cad kyi rjes su 'jug par byed cing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:54a-21: grol nas gzhan dgrol bar bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:54a-22: snyam nas de la 'dzin pa dang dran pa'i sems dang ldan par 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:54a-23: legs par byas pa'i rnam par smin pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:54a-24: rgyu dang mthun pa des na; byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams mchog tu tshe ring bar 'gyur la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:54a-25: ye shes kyi dbang phyug tu 'gyur zhing 'chi ba med par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:54b-0: de nas bcom ldan 'das la @54b byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'od srung chen po dang rus gcig pas 'di skad ces gsol to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:54b-2: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ci las bsam ste sems can thams cad la bu gcig pa'i 'du shes bsgom par bgyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:54b-4: de'i don ji lta bu lags /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:54b-6: gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sems can thams cad la bu gcig pa'i 'du shes bsgom par bgyi 'tshal na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:54b-8: mi 'dod par bgyi ba lags so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:54b-9: de ci'i slad du zhe na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:54b-11: bstan pa 'di la sems can kha cig tshul khrims 'chal ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:54b-12: mtshams ma mchis par bgyid pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:54b-13: dam pa'i chos sun 'byin pa dag kyang mchis na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:54b-15: sems can de lta bu dag la'ang bu gcig pa'i 'du shes bsgom par bgyi lags sam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:54b-16: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:54b-17: 'od srung chen po dang rus gcig pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:54b-20: sems can thams cad la sgra gcan zin bzhin du lta'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:54b-21: 'od srung chen po dang rus gcig pas gsol pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:54b-23: 'o na bsnyen par rdzogs pa'i 'khor dag pa rnams kyis bco lnga'i gso sbyong la bab pa'i tshe gzhon nu ma drangs pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:54b-25: bsnyen par ma rdzogs pa zhig rtsig pa'i gra zhig tu yibs te nyan pa na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:55a-0: ci'i slad du bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang nas gnod sbyin gyi rgyal po lag na rdo rjes rdul zhi ba @55a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:55a-1: mo bzhin phye mar brlags lags /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:55a-2: kye ma des de bkum pa ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:55a-3: lag na rdo rjes ha cang drags lags so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:55a-5: ji ltar bcom ldan 'das sems can thams cad la sgra gcan zin dang 'dra bar gzigs pa lags /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:55a-6: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:55a-11: dam pa'i chos sun 'byin pa rnams tshar gcad pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:55a-12: bskrad par bya ba'i phyir gnod sbyin gyi rgyal po lag na rdo rjes de ltar bstan par zad kyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:55a-13: dam pa'i chos sun phyung yang rung /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:55a-16: rgyu gsog pa'i srog gcod pa ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:55a-19: gzhan yang ji ltar rgyal po'am /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:55a-20: blon po chen po dag dam pa'i chos sun 'byin pa brlag par byed pa de bzhin du nga ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:55a-21: brlag par bya zhes mi zer mod kyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:55a-22: de dag nyid kyi chos ma yin pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du smin par zad do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:55a-23: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mkhyen pa ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:55a-24: de rnams kyi don du mi 'jigs pa sbyin zhing 'od zer gcig gam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:55a-26: gal te 'od zer des de dag lam phog na ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:55a-28: der de bzhin gshegs pas ci byar yang med do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:55a-30: gzhan yang gal te khyod kyis brtag dka' ba blta bar nus pa lta na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:55a-31: ngas khyod la rgyu gzhan yang bstan par bya ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:55b-0: yul so so na tshul khrims @55b dang; cho ga dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:55b-1: yon tan rnams tha dad pa yod la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:55b-2: der de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i 'og tu dge slong dag dam pa'i chos khol du 'byin par 'dod pa la rgyal pos ston pa med pa'i phyir gnod pa byed pa las rgyal po de rgyal po gzhan gyis bzlog ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:55b-3: des mthu chung bar byas nas rgyal po de chos la gnas par gyur na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:55b-4: rgyal po gcig shos de la bsod nams chen por 'gyur zhes nga smra'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:55b-6: rgyal po gcig shos kyi nyes pa chen po'i gzhi zhi bar byed pa'i phyir ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:55b-9: zhing ngam khyim du dug shing ngam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:55b-11: rtsa nas dbyung dgos pa de bzhin du tshul khrims 'chal pa rnams dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:55b-12: dam pa'i chos sun 'byin pa rnams bran bzhin du tshar gcad par ngas gnang ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:55b-13: gang dag de rnams tshar gcod par mi byed pa de dag ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:55b-14: nga'i bstan pa las shin tu ring ba yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:55b-15: gang dag de rnams tshar gcod par byed pa de dag ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:55b-18: 'od srung chen po dang rus gcig pas gsol pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:55b-19: gal te de bzhin gshegs pa de skad gsung na ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:55b-20: sems can thams cad la sgra gcan zin bzhin du gzigs pa'ang ma lags /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:55b-21: ste'u dang tsandan lta bu zhes bgyi ba'i ming yang brlag par 'gyur na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:55b-22: dam pa'i chos sun 'byin pa rnams ji ltar tshar gcad pa'i rigs lags /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:55b-23: de bzhin gshegs pas de ltar bgyid du stsal ba'i mi rigs lags so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:56a-2: 'od srung chen po dang rus gcig pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:56a-8: rgyal po'ang rung pa zhig gis rang gi bu sdug cing phangs la mchog tu mdzes shing byad gzugs phun sum tshogs pa rnams slob dpon gyi lag tu gtad nas slob dpon de la 'di skad smras te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:56a-9: bdag gi bu 'di rnams 'dul ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:56a-12: rig pa rnams bslab pa'i phyir khyod la gtad kyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:56a-18: gal te bdag gi bu 'di bzhi las gsum ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:56a-21: tshar bcad pa rnams kyis shi bar gyur la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:56a-30: lobs pa de la ci slob dpon gyis ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:56a-31: sdig pa mi dge ba'i las byas zhes bya 'am /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:56a-36: gnyis ka la'ang sdig pa'i las su mi 'gyur lags so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:56a-37: de ci'i slad du zhe na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:56a-39: 'khon gyi bsam pa ma mchis te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:56a-41: bsod nams mang po 'phel bar 'gyur lags so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:56a-42: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:56a-44: de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:56b-0: dam pa'i chos sun 'byin pa'i sems can rnams la sgra gcan zin bzhin du gzigs @56b te; bu rnams slob dpon gyi lag tu gtod pa bzhin du rgyal po dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:56b-2: dge bsnyen rnams kyi lag tu gtod par mdzad do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:56b-5: dge bsnyen de dag gis byis pa g-yel ba de dag tshar gcod par byed na /
