K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:160a-18: 'on te zhun mar rang nyid byung ngam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:160a-19: de bzhin du ci mar gyi nyinge khu de zhun mar gyi dngos po dang mgo mnyam du byung ngam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:160a-20: 'on te mar gyi nying khu rang nyid byung ngam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:160a-21: 'on te snum de gzhan zhig nas byung ngam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:160a-22: gal te gzhan zhig las byung na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:160a-23: de lta na gang las byung /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:160a-24: de ste 'o ma med par zho byung na ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:160a-26: gal te de lta na ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:160b-0: rang bzhin can du 'gyur la zho'i rgyu @160b dang rtags gnyis kyang snang ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:160b-2: gcig nas gcig tu brgyud de byung ba'ang yin la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:160b-3: dngos po de dag dang mgo mnyam du gcig nas gcig tu brgyud de byung zhes kyang mi bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:160b-4: gal te dngos po de dag dang mgo mnyam du ma byung na'ang de lta na ye med dam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:160b-5: ba las byung ba'i zhun mar yang gzhan las byung ba ma yin la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:160b-6: rang bzhin can de'ang thams cad la yod mod kyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:160b-7: 'on kyang nyes pas bsgribs pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:160b-8: phan tshun du 'dres pa'i tshul du 'dug pa'i phyir mi mngon te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:160b-9: nga'i zas kyi nyes pas 'o ma khrag gi dri nga ba bro la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:160b-10: bas rtsva mngar zos na ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:160b-12: rtsva ro tsha ba zos na ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:160b-14: gangs kyi ri la rtsva'i rigs snum can zhes bya ba zhig yod de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:160b-16: 'o ma mar gyi nyid khu'i rang bzhin kho nar 'byung ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:160b-20: sngo skya'ang ma yin pa mar gyi nying khu'i rang bzhin kho nar 'byung ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:160b-21: de ltar rtsva'i bye brag gi 'o ma mdog ngan pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:160b-22: mdog bzang por 'gyur ba de bzhin du ma rig pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:160b-23: rig pa gnyis su med mod kyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:160b-24: sems can rnams kyi las kyi nyes pas rig pa gang yin pa de nyid ma rig pa lta bur gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:160b-26: mi dge ba'i chos thams cad kyang gnyis su med pa kho na'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:161a-0: sngar bstan pa kho na bzhin du de bzhin gshegs @161a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:161a-2: mar gyi nying khu lta bu'i rang bzhin can yin mod kyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:161a-3: nyon mongs pa'i rnam pa'i nyes pa gzhan du snang bar gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:161a-6: lan tshva'i don gcig pu byed par zad mod kyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:161a-7: lan tshva'i don gcig pu byed pa'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:161a-8: zhes brjod par mi bya ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:161a-9: rgya mtsho'i nang na'o ma'i rgya mtsho zhes bya ba'ang yod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:161a-10: gangs kyi ri la'ang sman yod pa'i phyir yon tan las smos te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:161a-13: 'on kyang sman gtso bor smos pa de bzhin du lus 'di'ang de dang 'dra ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:161a-14: sbrul gdug pa lta ba'i khams bzhi'i dug dang ldan mod kyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:161a-15: sman gyi rgyal po de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po de yod pas na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:161a-16: de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po thog ma nas bcos ma ma yin pa'i khams yin la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:161a-18: glo bur du byung ba yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:161a-19: sangs rgyas su 'gyur bar 'dod pa su'ang rung ba rnams kyis ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:161a-20: nyon mongs pa'i rnam pa rnams gzhom par bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:161a-22: nam mkha' las 'brug sgra bsgrags na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:161a-23: sha mo myur bar rab tu skye bar 'gyur la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:161a-25: sha mo'i ming yang med do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:161a-26: 'brug sgras 'thon par 'gyur pa de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po de'ang nyon mongs pa'i rnam pas bsgribs pas bdag med pa bzhin du snang la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:161b-0: mdo chen po 'di thos pa gang yin pa @161b de dag yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa chen po 'di thos ma thag tu sha mo bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po'i shes pa skye bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:161b-5: ting nge 'dzin thams cad thos pas ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:161b-6: de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po yod par yang dag par mi shes so; ;dbyar gyi nam la sha mo skye ba bzhin du yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa chen po mdo chen po 'di las dgongs pa'i tshig gsang ba thams cad 'byung ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:161b-7: mdo sde 'di thos ma thag tu dbyar gyi nam la sha mo skye ba bzhin du sems can thams cad kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po yod par yang dag par shes par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:161b-8: de la don chen po rgyas par byed pas na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:161b-9: yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa chen po zhes bya ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:161b-10: yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa chen po'i mdo chen po 'di la slob pa gang yin pa de dag ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:161b-11: nga la drin du gzo ba yin no; ;gsol ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:161b-13: kye ma de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:161b-14: nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis mthong bar shin tu dka' ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:161b-15: rjes su shes par shin tu dka' ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:161b-16: bzod par shin tu dka' ba lags so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:161b-17: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:162a-0: @162a *// da'ang de kho na skad zer ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:162a-2: ji ltar mthong bar dka' ba lags /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:162a-6: long ba brgya zhig yod la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:162a-7: long ba de dag mig gis mthong bar 'dod pa'i phyir sman pa chen po mig mkhan zhig gnyer nas sman pa des de dag gis mig dpyad byas te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:162a-8: de dag gi mig spris yog pa bsal nas rang gi sor mo gcig bstan te de re re la 'di skad du /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:162a-9: kye mi khyod kyis nga'i sor mo ltos shig dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:162a-10: khyod kyi dpyad legs sam ma legs pa mngon no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:162a-12: de nas dpyad byas su zin kyang de'i sor mo thabs ji ltar bstan kyang mi de dag gis ma mthong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:162a-13: de nas lan gnyis lan gsum gyi bar du bstan pa dang de'u ma mthong ste mthong ba de bzhin du /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:162a-15: sa bcu thob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su sbyang ba'i dpyad thams cad byas pa rnams kyang de dang 'dra ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:162a-16: de ltar yongs su sbyang ba byas kyang mi de dag dang 'dra bar bdag nyid la de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po yod par lan gnyis lan gsum gyi bar du ngas bstan pa dang de'u ma mthong ste mthong nas 'di skad ces zer te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:162a-17: bdag cag kyang yun 'di srid kyi bar du bdag med pa'i 'khor lo gcig pus yongs su bskor na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:162b-0: nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas rnams kyis lta mthong re skan zhes zer @162b te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:162b-3: nga'i khams kyi bstan bcos la 'jug pa ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:162b-4: mthong bar dka' ba yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:162b-7: mi la la zhig gis nam mkha' la dang ba sprengs shing lding ba mthong la des de ltar mthong nas the tshom skyes te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:162b-9: 'on te dang pa lding pa yin zhig gu snyam nas des legs par brtags so /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:162b-10: ngang pa lding ba yin par 'ol spyir mthong ba de bzhin du sa bcu thob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis kyang bdag cag gis rang rang la de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po yod par 'ol spyir mthong ngo snyam du sems na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:162b-11: nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis lta mthong re skan /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:162b-13: mi la la lam du zhugs pa las mkhris pa 'khrugs te phyogs bslad nas legs par brtags na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:162b-14: lam dang gzugs 'ol spyir mthong ba de bzhin du sa bcu thob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis kyang legs par brtags na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:162b-15: rang gi lus la de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po byas pa ma yin pa'i khams yod par 'ol spyir mthong bar zad do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:162b-17: mgron po la la zhag skom gyis gdungs nas dbye dgon pa na chu mi rnyed da /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:162b-18: chu 'dod cing 'dug pa las shing ka na bya gar 'khod pa dag mthong nas ci 'di khang bzang zhig yin nam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:163a-1: nam mkha' yin snyam pa las legs par brtags na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:163a-2: bya gar yin par 'ol spyir mthong ba de bzhin du /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:163a-4: sa bcu thob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis kyang rang gi lus la de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po yod bzhin du yod par 'ol spyir mthong bar zad do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:163a-7: rgya mtsho'i grung zhugs pa'i mis dpag tshad mang po zhig gi pha rol nas grong khyer gyi nang na khang bzang dkar po zhig mthong nas 'di snyam du rtog ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:163a-8: ci 'di nam mkha' yin nam; khang bzang yin zhig gu snyam pa las legs par brtags na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:163a-9: 'ol spyir mthong ba de bzhin du sa bcu thob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis kyang rang gi lus la sangs rgyas kyi khams yod bzhin du yod par 'ol spyir mthong bar zad do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:163a-12: rgyal po'i bu gzhon nu skyid de bar 'dug pa zhig mtshan yal nangs su rol mo la ltad mo lta lta ba las langs te nyi ma'i 'od kyis mig 'khrugs par gyur pas legs par brtags na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:163a-13: rang gi ska rags 'ol spyir tsam mthong ba de bzhin du /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:163b-0: sa bcu thob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis kyang rang gi lus la sangs rgyas kyi khams yod par 'ol spyir mthong bar zad @163b do; ;dper na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:163b-1: rgyal po'i zham ring la la zhig mtshan mo mun nag sprin stug pos 'khrigs pa'i nang na rgyal po'i pho brang nas byung ste rang gi khyim du 'gro ba glog 'gyur ba'i skabs su glang khyab pa mdun logs nas 'ong ba mthong nas 'di snyam du rtog ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:163b-5: yang thog cig gam snyam pa las legs par brtags na; 'ol spyir mthong ba de bzhin du sa bcu thob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis kyang rang gi lus la sangs rgyas kyi khams yod bzhin du bdag gis lus la de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po yod do snyam du 'ol spyir mthong bar zad do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:163b-7: dge slong tshul khrims srung ba la gus pa la la zhig gis chu srog chags med pa la rang gi blos srog chags yod pa mthong nas 'di snyam du rtog ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:163b-10: yang na glo bur du 'ongs ba'i rdul lam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:163b-11: srog chags shig gam snyam pa las legs par brtags na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:163b-12: 'ol spyir mthong ba de bzhin du /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:163b-13: sa bcu thob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis kyang rang gi lus la de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po yod bzhin du yod par 'ol spyir mthong bar zad do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:164a-0: mi la la snga dro lho bur 'khrigs pa na phan tshun du 'gro ba las byis pa dag mthong nas 'di snyam @164a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:164a-4: 'on te bya rgod dam snyam pa las /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:164a-5: de'i 'og tu byis pa yin par 'ol spyir mthong ba de bzhin du /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:164a-6: sa bcu thob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyang rang gi lus la de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po yod bzhin du yod par 'ol spyir mthong bar zad do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:164a-8: byang chub sems dpa'i gzugs ras chen po la bris pa mtshan mo mun pa'i nang du bkram pa la mi mig yod pa dag gis brtags na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:164a-9: ci sangs rgyas kyi sku gzugs shig yin nam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:164a-10: 'on te ras dmar po zhig gam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:164a-11: 'on te dbang phyug chen po dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:164a-12: tshangs pa'i gzugs shig gam snyam pa las /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:164a-13: de'i 'og tu byang chub sems dpa'i gzugs yin par 'ol spyir mthong ba de bzhin du rigs kyi bu /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:164a-14: sa bcu thob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis kyang rang gi lus la de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po yod bzhin du yod par 'ol mthong bar zad do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:164a-17: de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:164a-18: mthong bar shin tu dka' ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:164a-19: de bzhin gshegs pa'i yul yin kyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:164a-21: rang sangs rgyas kyi yul ma yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:164a-25: mkhas pas rig par bya ba yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:164b-0: 'jig rten thams @164b cad dang mi mthun ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:164b-2: gal te de lta lags na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:164b-3: sha'i mig dang ldan pa rnams kyis cha phra ba ji ltar blta bar bgyi ba lags /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:164b-5: 'du shes med 'du shes med min gyi lha rnams kyang ji ltar blta bar bya /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:164b-7: sangs rgyas nyid kyi yul yin gyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:164b-9: rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yul ma yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:164b-11: mdo 'di rjes su mthun pa las yid ches par bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:164b-12: de ltar byas dang de dag kyang yang dag pa'i lta ba can du 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:164b-16: rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis kyang yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa chen po'i mdo chen po 'di'i tshul gyis bdag gi lus la de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po yod par yid ches par bya ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:164b-17: mdo sde dang rjes su mthun par brtson par bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:164b-18: de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po de bzhin gshegs pa'i yul yin gyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:164b-19: nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi yul ma yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:164b-22: 'jig rten pa rnams la'ang sems can gyi khams gang zag bzhag pa mchis lags so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:164b-31: de gnyis phan tshun byams pas gcig gi khyim du gcig 'gro zhing rtse bar byed la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:165a-0: de nas mi dbul po des rgyal po'i bu @165a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:165a-1: de'i ral gri de la mdog bzang po de mthong ba las rgyal po'i bu des ral gri de khyer nas yul gzhan du song ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:165a-2: de nas mi dbul po de mtshan mo mgon med pa'i rten khang zhig tu nyal ba las brdol te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:165a-3: ral gri ral gri zhes zer nas de'i tshig grong srung rnams kyis thos nas rgyal po la gsol te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:165a-4: rgyal po des mi de bkug nas kva'i ral gri ci 'dra ba zhig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:165a-5: ga las 'ongs zhes smras pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:165a-6: des skabs de'i gtam rgyal po de la gsol nas lha /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:165a-7: gal te bdag gis brkus par gyur na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:165a-8: bdag gi rkang lag 'di dag bcad du gsol /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:165a-10: mdza' bo dang lhan cig rtse ba'i tshe mthong bar bas te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:165a-11: reg kyang ma reg lags so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:165a-13: de nas rgyal po des de la smras pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:165a-15: mdog ci 'dra ba zhig ces byas nas des rgyal po la gsol ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:165a-18: ra ru 'dra ba zhig lags so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:165a-20: de nas rgyal po des mi de btang ste mi khyod ma 'jigs shig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:165a-22: skyen par gar bde bar song zhig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:165a-23: khyod kyis sngon ral gri de rgyal po'i pho brang 'dir mthong yang ma mthong ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:165a-24: rgyal po'i bus rang gi yul du tshong 'dus nas rnyed pa lta zhig ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:165a-26: rgyal pos kyang rnyed par dka'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:165a-28: de nas rgyal po des mdun na 'don dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:165b-0: blon po rnams la ral gri @165b de mthong ngam zhes byas nas shi'o /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:165b-1: gzhan yang che'o cog gis ral gri de btsal kyang ma rnyed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:165b-2: de nas rgyal po'i bu gzhan zhig rgyal sar bcug nas des ral gri de rnyed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:165b-4: ma rnyed bzhin du rgyal po byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:165b-5: de ltar gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa'i rgyal po de dag gis ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:165b-6: ral gri de ma mthong ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:165b-11: snyam du rtog par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:165b-13: ci dga' mgur rtog par byed pa de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'ang mtha'i rgyal po'i bu de 'dra bar 'jig rten du 'byung ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:165b-14: bdag gi de kho na nyid bstan nas 'chi bar byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:165b-15: de nas blo chung ba gang yin pa de dag ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:165b-16: sems can thams cad la bdag 'di lta bu; 'di 'dra ba zhig yod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:165b-17: snyam ste log par mthong nas shes rab med pa rnams la rmi lam du rmis pa bzhin du ston par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:165b-18: 'jig rten pa de dag gis kyang de skad du thos nas rang gi lus la bdag gi khams yod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:165b-19: snyam du rtog par byed la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:165b-20: de dag gis bdag de'i rang bzhin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:165b-22: de ltar byang chub sems dpa'i tshig thos nas log par bzung ste ral gri ra ru 'dra bar rtog pa de bzhin du rnam pa mang por rtog par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:165b-23: 'jig rten pa rnams skyes bu mthe bo tsam zhes bya ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:166a-0: ldum bu sha ma dka'i 'bras bu tsam dang @166a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:166a-1: 'bras kyi 'bru tsam zhig snying la gnas te 'bar ro zhes log par rtog par byed de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:166a-2: de dag gi lta ba de ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:166a-3: log par lta ba gcig nas gcig tu brgyud de 'ongs pa yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:166a-5: bde bar 'gyur ba ma yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:166a-7: ngas bdag med par bstan to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:166a-8: 'on kyang da dung 'jig rten pa rnams bdag yod do snyam du log par rtog par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:166a-11: yang nga'i bstan pa las ral gri yang dag pa dang 'dra bar bdag ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:166a-13: zhes de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po ngas bshad par bya'o //

K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:166a-15: 'jig rten pa rnams kyi yin na'ang 'jig rten las 'das pa yin par rig par bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:166a-16: 'jig rten pa'i nang na rnam pa thams cad du chos kyi mchog ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:166a-17: byang chub sems dpa' sprul pa yin par rig par bya ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:166a-20: gsang sngags ci'ang rung ba de dag thams cad ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:166a-21: rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis gsungs pa yin par shes par gyis shig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:166a-23: bcom ldan 'das kyis yi ge'i phyi mo ji ltar bka' stsal lags /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:166a-24: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:166a-25: yi ge'i phyi mo thams cad ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:166a-26: thog mar yi ge phyed pa sprul te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:166a-27: phyi mo rnams la rig sngags dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:166b-0: gsang sngags @166b dang; chos kyi de kho na nyid dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:166b-1: phung po thams cad kyi gzungs su 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:166b-2: de'ang dam pa'i chos kyi tshul yi ge'i phyi mo bslab na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:166b-4: chos ma yin pa'i bye brag phyed par 'gyur ba'i phyir ngas sprul pa yin gyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:166b-5: chos ma yin pa'i phyir ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:166b-8: yi ge zhes bgyi ba'i don gang lags /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:166b-11: yi ge zhes bya ste; gang gi phyir yi ge thams cad nges pa yin pa'i phyir te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:166b-13: yi ge'i sgra bcu bzhi zhes bya ba gang gi mi phyed pa'i don gang yin zhe na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:166b-15: yi ge zhes bya ba ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:166b-16: de bzhin gshegs pa'i don to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:166b-18: rdo rje'i sku mi phyed pa yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:166b-19: de bzhin gshegs pa la sgo dgu nas 'dzag ces bya ba'ang med la sgo dgu po nyid kyang med do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:166b-23: nges pa yin pa'i phyir yi ge zhes bya ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:166b-24: byas pa ma yin pa'i don to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:166b-27: gzhi gsum zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:166b-28: yang aa zhes bya ba ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:166b-29: 'phags pa rnams kyi ye shes kyi tshig bla dvags so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:166b-30: 'phags pa gang dag yin zhe na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:166b-33: rung ba thams cad kyis chog par 'dzin pa gang yin pa rnams dang /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:167a-1: ba gang yin pa de dag la ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:167a-4: chos lugs su stan pa ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:167a-8: 'jig rten dang mthun par 'jug pa zhes bya bas na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:167a-9: don tha dad pa ma yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:167a-10: yang a'a zhes bya bas don ci zhig rgyas par byed ce na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:167a-11: 'phags pa rnams la brten nas sems can thams cad kyis cho ga dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:167a-16: gces pa yin par shes shing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:167a-20: 'phags pa gang yin pa de dag ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:167a-22: rigs kyi bu mo theg pa chen po la zhugs pa rnams te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:167a-23: dge slong tshul khrims dang ldan pa rnams dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:167a-24: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag la 'phags pa zhes bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:167a-25: yang a'a zhes bya ba ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:167a-29: khyod kyis tshul ma yin pa byas kyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:167a-30: phyin chad de ltar ma byed cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:167a-31: ces bya ba de lta bu tshul ma yin pa rnams de'i tshe dran par byed pa'i don to //

K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:167b-3: snyam du snyams su myong bar bya ba'i don to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:167b-15: de'i phyir de la 'jig rten skyong ba zhes bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:167b-16: yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa chen po'i mdo chen po 'di ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:167b-17: sems can gzhan dag gi don gyi phyir dbang phyug rnams kyis zhus so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:167b-18: dbang phyug rnams kyis yongs su bzung ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:167b-19: dbang phyug rnams kyis bshad do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:167b-20: dbang phyug rnams kyis dam pa'i chos mchog tu 'bar bar byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:167b-21: dbang phyug rnams kyi phyir ngas bstan te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:167b-23: yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa chen po'i mdo chen po bstan to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:167b-25: dbang phyug dang ldan pa rnams kyi shin tu rgyas pa yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:167b-26: 'di la phrag dog byed pa rnams ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:167b-27: zhing la zhing gi rngo bsal ba bzhin du tshar gcad par bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:167b-28: de la sogs pa'i don du ma rgyas par byed pas na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:167b-29: de'i phyir ngas a'i zhes bya ba bstan to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:167b-32: mdo sde 'dis mdo sde thams cad kyi don gyi phyi ma'i yang phyi ma bstan to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:167b-34: rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis sngon ma thos pa'i yi ge gcig pa'am /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:168a-1: ni; mchog dam pa yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:168a-3: byang gi sgra mi snyan gyi sems can rnams bsod nams dang ldan pa de bzhin du mdo sde chen po 'di nyan pa gang yin pa de dag ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:168a-6: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yin par rig par bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:168a-9: rgyud phyi ma zhes bya ba'i don to; ;de bas na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:168a-13: ba'i nu sor lta bu'i don te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:168a-15: ba'i 'o ma zhim pa bzhin du mdo 'di'i ro'ang de dang 'dra'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:168a-16: mdo sde 'di las de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po bstan pa spong bar byed pa gang yin pa de dag ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:168a-19: drin du mi gzo ba bdag gis bdag gas par sems pa de dag mchog tu mya ngan du bya ba de bzhin du /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:168a-20: de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po spangs nas bdag med pa ston pa'i sems can gang yin pa de dag ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:168a-21: mchog tu mya ngan du bya ba yin par rig par bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:168a-25: de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das zhes bya ba 'di ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:168a-26: sangs rgyas rnams kyi chos nyid de; de bas na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:168a-29: de bzhin gshegs pa'i don te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:168b-0: ji ltar song ba de bzhin @168b du 'ongs pas na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:168b-3: nyon mongs pa rnams kyi don te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:168b-4: sman du 'gyur bas mi las de bzhin gshegs par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:168b-6: ao zhes bya'o; ;aoo zhes bya ba ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:168b-7: theg pa chen po'i don te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:168b-8: sgra bcu bzhi po thams cad kyi mjug ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:168b-11: rgyud thams cad kyi rgyud phyi ma'i yang phyi ma zhes bya ste; de bas na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:168b-14: nga'i bstan pa la rung ba ma yin pa thams cad bzlog pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:168b-15: gser dang dngul spangs pa ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:168b-17: bzlog pa'i don du aam zhes bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:168b-19: theg pa mchog gi don te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:168b-22: de bzhin du sangs rgyas kyis gsungs pa'i mdo sde thams cad dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:168b-23: rgyud thams cad kyi mtha' ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:168b-24: theg pa chen po yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:168b-26: snying rjes sems can thams cad la dgra gcan zin bzhin du blta ba'i don te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:168b-27: bdag gis sems can thams cad kyi don bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:168b-28: snyam du de ltar bsam par bya ba yin pas na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:168b-31: de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsang ba'i don te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:168b-32: mi bgrungs pa rnams kyis shes par mi nus pas na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:168b-36: sems can thams cad la de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po yod pas na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:169a-3: de bzhin gshegs pa rtag ces bya ba'i don te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:169a-7: nga zhes bya ba ni; 'du byed mi rtag ces bya ba'i don te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:169a-12: sems can thams cad yongs su smin par bya bas na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:169a-15: de bzhin gshegs pa dkar po'i chos rnams kyis gdugs gcig pa lam mer bzhugs pa yin te /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:169a-22: nyon mongs pa rnams skyon par sprug par bya ba'i don te /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:169a-30: ta bzhin du dzambu'i gling kha cig tu de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshungs pa med pa'i sku ston par mdzad de /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:169a-39: nub par mi 'gyur ba'i phyir da zhes bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:169a-41: ngo tsha mi shes pa'i don te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:169b-0: bla ma rnams la drin du mi @169b gzo bas na /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:169b-7: srid pa thams cad du ltung ba las bzlog pa'i don te /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:169b-15: theg pa chen po la brtson par bya ba la dga' bar gyis shig pa'i don te /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:169b-23: gzhi gsum grong khyer gyi sgo gtan gyi rtan ma bzhin du shin tu brtan pas na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:169b-26: phyin ci log gi don te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:169b-27: gzhi gsum nub par mi 'gyur ba la bdag nyid yongs su rmongs par 'gyur bas na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:169b-30: 'jig rten thams cad 'jig pa'i don te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:169b-31: 'jig rten 'jig pa na gzhi gsum 'jig par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:169b-33: bdag nyid kyi 'bras bu 'jig par byed pa ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:169b-34: sgrub pa las nyams pas na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:169b-37: de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi stobs rnams kyi tshig bla dvags te /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:170a-3: byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:170a-4: dam pa'i chos kyi khur khyer ba yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:170a-9: nges par rang gi khur khyer bar byed pa 'di ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:170a-10: byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi chos lugs yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:170a-14: don bzhi pa rnams byang chub sems dpas bya dgos pas na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:170a-19: gti mug gi 'jigs pa bsal bas de kho na nyid kyi don la chos la 'jug pas na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:170a-22: nyan thos kyi theg pa las gyen du bskyod nas theg pa chen po mi g-yo ba nyid brtsam par bya ba yin pas na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:170a-25: 'jig rten thams cad kyi rig sngags dang /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:170a-35: mdo sde chen po 'di thos na shin tu rgyas pa thams cad thos par 'gyur bas na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:170b-0: dam pa'i chos dbyung ba'i sems @170b kyi don te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:170b-4: kye ma bdag gis 'khor ba mthar gtugs so //

K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:170b-6: snyam du dga' ba dang yongs su gdung ba'i don te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:170b-11: bdud bye ba snyed kyis kyang dge 'dun dbye bar mi nus mod kyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:170b-13: 'jig rten dang mthun par mdzad pa ston to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:170b-14: yang ksha zhes bya ba ni /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:170b-27: dge 'dun phye ba ston pa na bslab pa'i gzhi bca' ba'i phyir tshul gzhan dag kyang sprul te thabs ston pa de mthong na shes rab can skrag par mi bya ba 'di ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:170b-28: 'jig rten dang mthun par bya ba yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:170b-29: snyam du yid ches par bya ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:170b-31: ri r'i li l'i zhes bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:170b-32: mchu gnyis las byung ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:170b-33: lce drung nas byung ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:170b-34: kha sna gnyis nas byung ba dang /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:176b-31: lha'i mig med pa'i mi rnams kyis ni; bdag la bdag yod du zin kyang mi mthong ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:176b-34: nyon mongs pa'i rnam pa'i 'du byed rnams gang yin pa'i chos de dag ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:176b-41: shes rab ldan pa ri khar 'dug pa yis //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:176b-42: byis pa sa la 'dug pa legs par mthong //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:177a-1: khang bzang steng na 'dug pa yis //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:177a-2: mya ngan med kyang skye rgu mya ngan mthong //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:177a-3: zhes bya ba lta bu ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:177a-4: de ltar nyon mongs pa'i rnam pa bcad nas shes rab can ri kha na gnas pas nyon mongs pa'i rnam pa dang 'brel pa'i byis pa mthong ba bzhin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:177a-6: shes rab khang thog mchis pa gang dag lags //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:177a-7: mya ngan ma mchis gang lags 'jig rten na; ;mya ngan ma mchis mya ngan 'das pa la //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:177a-8: mya ngan dag ni ji ltar mchis par 'gyur //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:177a-9: gal te sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das yongs su mya ngan las 'das na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:177a-10: byis pa rnams kyis ji ltar mthong lags /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:177a-11: shes rab kyi khang bzang gi steng du'ang ji ltar bzhugs lags /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:177a-12: mi ri kha na mchis pas ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:177a-15: mchis na gdod rung ba lags na; yongs su mya ngan las 'das pas ji ltar mthong lags /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:177a-17: shes rab kyi khang bzang ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:177a-20: de bzhin gshegs pa'o; ;mya ngan gyi shas che ba ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:177a-28: ri rab bzhin du brtan pa'i phyir ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:177a-33: shes rab can zhes bya ba ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:177b-0: rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi @177b don te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:177b-2: mya ngan med cing brtan pa'i phyir ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:177b-4: mya ngan can gyi nang na mya ngan med pa ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:177b-5: sems can rnams kyi mya ngan gyi zug rngu sel ba'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:177b-7: gal te de bzhin gshegs pa mya ngan las ma 'das na ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:177b-9: rdzogs par sangs ma rgyas pa zhes bgyi'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:177b-12: gang na gdul bar bya ba rnams yod pa der ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:177b-13: rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas snang ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:177b-14: der skye ba lta bur ston to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:177b-19: zal mo lta bu zhes bya'o ////
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:177b-20: 'phags pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa theg pa chen po'i mdo /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:177b-25: nyin par snang ba na kha cig tu ltung ba lta bur snang ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:177b-26: de nas sems can rnams kyi zla ba ltung ngo snyam du 'dzin to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:177b-29: gling gzhan du 'char bar 'gyur la der yang zla ba skyes pa med do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:177b-31: zla ba shar to snyam du 'dzin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:177b-33: lhung ba lta bur snang yang 'jig par mi 'gyur la 'char ba lta bur snang yang skye ba med de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:177b-34: ri'i rgyal po ri rab kyis bsgribs pas mi snang bar zad la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:177b-36: rang bzhin gyis skyes zin pa yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:177b-37: snang byed rnams kyi chos nyid ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:178a-0: de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom @178a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:178a-1: pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyang stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na dzambu'i gling la lar ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:178a-2: pha ma phrad pa las skyes par yang snang ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:178a-3: sems can rnams kyis skyes so snyam du 'dzin la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:178a-4: de bzhin gshegs pa la ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:178a-7: yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba lta bur snang la de bzhin gshegs pa la ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:178a-13: skye ba lta bur snang yang skye ba'ang med /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:178a-15: gdul bar bya ba'i dbang gis ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:178a-16: zla ba bzhin du'ang rgyu bar mdzad do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:178a-18: gling kha cig tu zla ba nya ba yongs su rgyas pa lta bur snang ste; sems can rnams zla ba nya'o snyam du 'dzin to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:178a-20: gling kha cig tu yi ge ta 'dra bar zla ba tshes par yang snang ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:178a-21: dzambu'i gling ba rnams kyis deng zla ba tshes gcig yin no snyam du 'dzin to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:178a-22: de nas zla ba phyed par 'dzin to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:178a-23: de nas tshes bco lnga yin no snyam ste zla ba nya bar 'dzin to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:178a-25: zla ba phyed yin par 'dzin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:178a-30: ri rab kyi rkyen gyis de ltar snang ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:178b-0: de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang @178b dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyang dzambu'i gling la lar ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:178b-1: yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba lta bur snang ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:178b-2: sems can rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das so snyam du 'dzin to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:178b-4: zla ba tshes pa bzhin du skye ba lta bur snang ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:178b-5: sems can rnams kyis khye'u 'di skyes so snyam du 'dzin to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:178b-6: zla ba tshes gnyis dang 'dra bar ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:178b-8: zla ba tshes gsum dang 'dra bar ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:178b-9: yi ge slob pa'i sar 'gro bar 'dzin to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:178b-10: zla ba tshes brgyad lta bur ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:178b-12: zla ba nya ba lta bur ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:178b-13: 'od kyis mun pa bsal ba bzhin du bdud bye ba snyed brlags nas lam mer bzhugs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:178b-14: zla ba nub pa lta bur ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:178b-15: yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar ston te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:178b-16: zla ba gza' rnams kyis bskor ba bzhin du mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus brgyan to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:178b-20: skye bar 'dzin la skyes pa'ang med /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:178b-23: zla ba nya ba bzhin du dus thams cad du rtag pa yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:178b-25: de bzhin gshegs pa rtag pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:178b-34: chu ra chus gang ba rnams dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:179a-1: srid du'ang rung sems can rnams gang du 'gro ba de dag thams cad du snang ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:179a-2: der byis pa rnams kyis yid la zla ba 'di ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:179a-3: bdag kho na'i phyi bzhin 'ba' zhig tu 'ong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:179a-5: gang gi tshe khyim gyi nang du mthong ba de'i tshe ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:179a-8: zla ba 'di de nyid yin nam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:179a-9: 'on te gzhan zhig yin zhig gu snyam du rtog go //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:179a-10: de la byis pa kha cig gis ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:179a-11: zla ba chu ra tsam du 'dzin to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:179a-13: shing rta'i 'phang lo'i tshad tsam du 'dzin to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:179a-15: zla ba dpag tshad lnga bcu pa tsam la zlum po yin par shes so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:179a-17: zla ba srin bu me khyer tsam du mthong ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:179a-18: skye gnas thams cad dang ldan pa'i dud 'gro rnams kyis zla ba la rang rang gi rnam par shes pas brtags nas so sor mthong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:179a-19: de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'ang 'jig rten du byung na thams cad du snang ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:179a-20: sems can kha cig gis de bzhin gshegs pa zla ba dang 'dra bar 'dzin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:179a-21: bdag la thugs brtse ba'i phyir bdag gi khyim gyi phugs na bzhugs so snyam mo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:179a-23: rang rang gi skye gnas kyi lus lta bur mthong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:179a-24: sems can lkug pa rnams kyis ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:179a-25: de bzhin gshegs pa lkug par mthong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:179b-0: 'on pa dang lag rdum rnams kyis kyang bdag nyid dang @179b 'dra bar mthong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:179b-3: yi ge tha dad pa rnams kyis kyang bdag cag dang 'dra'o snyam du 'dzin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:179b-5: bdag gi 'du shes dang mthun no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:179b-6: bdag gi kha zas za'o snyam du 'dzin to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:179b-7: lus che ba rnams kyang de bzhin gshegs pa ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:179b-8: bdag cag dang 'dra'o snyam du 'dzin to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:179b-10: nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas yin no snyam du 'dzin to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:179b-12: ya mtshan can thams cad kyi nang du rab tu byung bar mthong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:179b-14: de bzhin gshegs pa bdag cag gi phyir 'jig rten du byung ngo snyam du 'dzin to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:179b-16: zla ba rang bzhin du gnas pas so so'i rang bzhin du thams cad mgu bar byed pa de bzhin du //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:179b-17: de bzhin gshegs pa'ang chos kyi sku yin bzhin du [?] kyi sku dug sman gyi sdong po dang 'dra bar 'dzin pa'i sems can rnams mgu bar mdzad de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:179b-18: 'jig rten thams cad dang mthun par mdzad pa dag gis skyes pa'i rabs stong phrag mang po ston par mdzad do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:179b-21: thams cad du skye ba ston pa'i phyir skyes pa'i rabs kyi zla ba zhes bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:180a-0: lha ma yin gyi dbang po sgra gcan phrad pa'i tshe 'jig rten pa rnams kyi zla ba gzas zin to snyam du @180a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:180a-3: zla ba la 'dzin par yang mi byed la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:180a-5: de la za bar yang mi nus te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:180a-6: sgra gcan gyi lag pas zla ba bsgribs nas 'od mi snang bar byed par zad de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:180a-9: ji tsam du sgra gcan gyi lag pas zla ba bkab pa de tsam du zla ba'i 'od mi snang bar 'gyur la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:180a-10: sgra gcan gyis zla ba btang ba'i tshe ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:180a-11: kha nas byung ba lta bur snang ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:180a-12: mi rnams kyis zla ba ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:180a-13: sdug bsngal zhing 'dug go snyam du 'dzin to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:180a-15: rang bzhin kho nar 'dug bzhin du bdag nyid sgra gcan dang lhan cig 'dug par ston te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:180a-18: sgra gcan bye ba snyed kyis kyang zla ba gsad pa'am gzhig par mi nus te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:180a-19: zla ba rang nyid de ltar ston to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:180a-20: de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyid zla ba lta bur ston par mdzad de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:180a-21: ma 'ongs pa'i dus kyi don du ngan sems kyis khrag phyung ba'i mtshams med pa'i las bstan pa'i phyir de la sogs pa'i 'dod chen pa'i mtha' dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:180a-22: dge 'dun gyi dbyen gyi chos tha dad pa'ang ston par mdzad do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:180a-23: de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku la ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:180a-24: bdud bye ba phrag 'bum gyis kyang khrag dbyung bar mi nus la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:180a-25: de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku la ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:180b-1: sdug bsngal ba'i bag kyang med do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:180b-4: de bzhin gshegs pa la rma byung ngo snyam du 'dzin to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:180b-5: de bzhin gshegs pa ni; rang bzhin kho nar bzhugs mod kyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:180b-6: de ltar 'jig rten dang mthun par ston to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:180b-8: mi la las mi zhig la 'breng pa'am /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:180b-9: dbyug pas bsnun te khrag phyung ba'am /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:180b-10: gsad pa'i sems kyis de bsad nas de'i 'og tu de bzhin gshegs pas las de btsan par mdzad par dgongs te de bzhin gshegs pa la ngan sems kyis khrag phyung ba na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:180b-11: mi de'i sems thugs su chud nas mtshams med pa'i las yang dag par ston par mdzad do /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:180b-14: ma 'ongs pa'i don gyi phyir las kyi rnam par dbye ba ston par mdzad do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:180b-16: sman pa la la zhig gis rang gi bu la rtsa ba'i ming gi rnam grangs slob par byed de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:180b-21: zhes rtsa ba'i rnam par dbye ba dag gi sgo nas ngo ston par byed de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:180b-22: khye'u des kyang de ltar bslab nas rtsa ba'i rnam par dbye ba shes par gyur la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:180b-23: de nas sman pa de shi nas khye'u de na re //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:180b-26: khyod kyi bdag rtsa ba'i rnam par dbya ba bslab pa ste rtsa ba 'di ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:181a-0: zhes de skad zer ba de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pas kyang bslab pa'i @181a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:181a-1: gzhi thams cad kyi sprul pa sprul par mdzad de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:181a-6: 'dod chen pa'i mtha' rnams ston par mdzad de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:181a-7: ma 'ongs pa'i dus na 'di lta bur 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:181a-9: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas dge slong rnams kyis sman pa'i bu bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pas mdo sde las 'di skad ces bka' stsal te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:181a-14: zla ba la gza' 'jug pa na mi rnams kyis ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:181a-15: zla ba drug cing zla ba la gza' 'jug par shes so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:181a-16: steng gi lha rnams kyis ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:181a-17: nyin gcig bzhin du zla ba la gza' 'jug par shes te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:181a-19: de dag gi lo tshigs ring la mi rnams kyi lo tshigs thung ba'i phyir ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:181a-21: de bzhin du lha rnams dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:181a-23: de bzhin gshegs pa sku tshe thung ngo snyam du 'dzin to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:181a-24: ji ltar lha gong ma gong ma rnams kyis skad cig skad cig la zla ba la gza' 'jug par 'dzin pa de bzhin du /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:181a-25: lha gong ma gong ma rnams kyis skad cig skad cig la de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba bye ba snyed kyang ston par mdzad do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:181b-0: 'chi bdag gi @181b bdud bye ba snyed kyang ston pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:181b-1: skyes pa'i rabs stong snyed kyang ston pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:181b-2: 'jig rten dang mthun par bya ba mang po dag ston par shes so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:181b-5: dpag tu med pa yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:181b-11: sems can thams cad kyi yid du 'ong zhing blta na sdug pa yin pas na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:181b-12: de'i phyir ming zla ba zhes bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:181b-13: 'dod pa'i dbang du gyur pa 'dod chags dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:181b-15: gti mug spyod pa rnams kyi yid du 'ong ba ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:181b-17: de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyang rang bzhin gyis sems can chos 'dod pa rnams kyi yid du 'ong ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:181b-18: mchog tu blta na sdug pa yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:181b-19: sdang ba'i sems dang ldan pa gzhan dag gi yid du 'ong ba ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:181b-22: de bzhin gshegs pa zla ba dang 'dra ba yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:181b-24: nyi ma dus tshigs gsum du 'gyur zhing 'pho ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:181b-27: sos ka'i dus gsum du rgyu bar byed la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:181b-29: nyi ma myur ba kho nar 'go'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:181b-33: nyi ma ring du thogs shing 'gro ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:181b-35: de bzhin gshegs pa'ang 'jig rten gsum du skye ba rnam pa gsum ston par mdzad de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:181b-36: sems can tshe thung du rnams kyi nang du ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:182a-2: sems can rnams kyis sangs rgyas sku tshe thung ngo snyam du 'dzin to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:182a-3: nyan thos kyi theg pa pa rnams la ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:182a-4: dgun gyi nyi ma bzhin du sku tshe thung bar ston to //

K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:183a-2: gzhi gsum med par yang mi 'gyur la rtag pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:183a-4: ther zug par 'dug bzhin du nyes pa rnams kyis kyang gos par mi 'gyur ba 'di ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:183a-5: sangs rgyas rnams kyi chos nyid do //

K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:183a-17: de dag gi chos nyid do //

K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:183b-3: yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa chen po'i mdo chen po bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i yul 'di ni /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:186a-14: lo stong gi bar du bdar du zin kyang 'dam rdzab de las chu dbyung ba ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-054-001:186a-16: de bzhin du 'dod chen pa'ang dge ba'i rtsa ba zad cing gzhi med par 'gyur ba yin pas de ni /
